Article Title: Competing Information and Attention Allocation: Evidence From China
Source Title: ECBI: 2009 INTERNATIONAL CONFERENCE ON ELECTRONIC COMMERCE AND BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE, PROCEEDINGS
Conference Title: International Conference on Electronic Commerce and Business Intelligence
Conference Sponsor: Soc Management Sci China, Acad Comm
Author Keywords: competing information; attention allocation
Abstract: This paper investigate the investor attraction hypothesis by examining how the number of earnings by other firms affects the sensitivity of a firm's announcement-period return, and post-event return reaction to its earnings surprise. The evidence indicates that the immediate stock price reaction to a firm's earnings surprise is weaker, and post-earnings announcement drift is weaker, when a greater number of earnings announcements by other firms are made on the same day. These findings generally support the investor attraction hypothesis

Abstract: Nowadays, there are more and more studies about enterprise knowledge management. Among them, the way of promoting the sharing and transition of tacit knowledge has long been an emphasis in the study of business knowledge management. Many factors affect the sharing and transition of tacit knowledge, one of which is enterprise culture. By analysis, the paper thinks that the enterprise network culture targets to set up a value system that is composed by values, such as people-orientation, trust, and sharing, and this culture will strongly propel the transition, transformation and sharing of business knowledge.

Article Title: Research and Application of Fuzzy Multi Attribute Decision Method on Investing Enterprise
Source Title: ISBIM: 2008 INTERNATIONAL SEMINAR ON BUSINESS AND INFORMATION MANAGEMENT, VOL 2
Conference Title: International Seminar on Business and Information Management (ISBIM 2008)
Conference Sponsor: Engn Technol Press,Intelligent Informat Technol Applicat Assoc,CPS,IEEE Comp Soc
Author Keywords: fuzzy multi attribute decision method; information entropy; uncertain theory; matrix standardization
Abstract: With the development of uncertain theory, fuzzy multi attribute decision method has been applicated in more and more areas, this paper applies fuzzy multi attribute decision method in the assessment of investing enterprise. In modern society, social economy has developed rapidly, the investor has more and more opportunities to invest. Because of the complexity and uncertainty of objective things and the fuzziness of man's thinking, the investment always has certain risk, if the evaluation about investment target is inaccurate, which will cause blindness in investment, then the investment profit cann't take back, so the assessment method on investing enterprise is very important. Information entropy is a kind of quantity of the system uncertainty, this paper researches the method of fuzzy multi attribute decision method based on information entropy, uses information entropy to decide attribute weight, and applies it in the assessment of investing enterprise, the example shows that this method is effective.

Author Keywords: Marketization Degree; Index System; Factor Analysis; Policy Recommendations
Abstract: In the process of marketization, regional economic development is extremely uneven in China. How to measure marketization degree of regional economy so that the government could guide actual economic policy is a very realistic problem. In this paper, we use factor analysis of multivariate statistical analysis methods and set some corresponding indicators in the development of tertiary industry, the extent of opening to the outside world, the extent of non-public economic development, the Government adapt to market-oriented and the level of rural social security to comparatively study regional economic marketization degree. Our aim is to provide a basic analysis for the government to make decisions and put forward some suggestions for policy-makers.

Abstract: Evaluation of science and technology competitiveness is a very important part in science and technology management, in which the design and selection of evaluation methods is the difficulty the core. In this paper, super-efficiency DEA approach is used to evaluate the science and technology competitiveness of China's 31 provinces (municipalities and autonomous regions). It s shown that the gap of efficiency among provinces is very big, that total science and technology competitiveness efficiency and structural science and technology competitiveness efficiency is basically coincident, that the efficiency value has nothing to do with the level of economic development.

Article Title: Application of Group Decision-making Based on FC-OWA Operator in Logistics Location
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Fuzzy Number; Group Decision-making; Logistics Location; FC-OWA Operator
Abstract: Distribution of logistics center has a great influence on modern logistics activities. Resonate location of logistics centers can reduce transportation cost, significantly operating cost, and enhance the competitiveness. In this paper, a new method of dealing with fuzzy data information for logistics site selection is raised based on the continuous fuzzy ordered weighted operator. The method can avoid the arithmetic and comparison of fuzzy number. At the end, some examples are given to show the feasibility of the method.

Article Title: The Design of Pre-warning Index System of Real Estate Market and Its Empirical Analysis
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Real Estate Industry; Pre-warning Index; Empirical Analysis
Abstract: In recent years, owing to the growth rate of investment in real estate is too large, and the rise in prices is excessively rapid, the real estate market has appeared different degrees of excessive heat phenomena and structural problems in some areas of China, which indicates a severe market risk. Therefore, establishing the pre-warning index system of real estate market becomes an important problem. In this paper, we designed a pre-warning index system of the real estate market in China and gave an empirical analysis by studying the case of real estate in Nanchang.

Article Title: A Composite Index Method Applied to Evaluating Technique and Tennis Players
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Tennis Competitions; Techniques and Tactics; Application; Evaluation
Abstract: Tennis players' effectiveness of technique and tactics applied in the game are comprehensively evaluated by using mathematical statistics composite index method. Mathematical statistics composite index method can test training effectiveness and existing problems, which has guiding significance to improve athletic performance, diagnose application of technical and tactical effects, and maintain top form and scientific arrangements cycle training and competitions. The main conclusion: the gap between the current level of Chinese competitive tennis team and the world's top team is quite large. The application of integrated index evaluation, diagnosis of tennis athletes' technology, and tactics effect in the games has a certain practical significance to improve training methods and means, establish training targets model theory guidance and innovation, and eventually realize the strategic goal of Olympic gold.

Abstract: Using improved AHP approach, this paper studies the key points affecting grain potential production of Heilongjiang province, and compares the production of twelve areas in Heilongjiang province. Authors: Xu, YK; Chen, QH; Wu, Z
Author Full Names: Xu Yingkai; Chen Qiuhua; Wu Zeng
Article Title: Application of Cluster Analysis in National Land Tax Structure Analysis in the Sixteenth Century
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Land Tax Structure; Converted into Silver; Monetization; Cluster Analysis
Abstract: In order to study national financial structure of the late period in Ming Dynasty, it is necessary to analyze the most important element of national financial structure at that time land tax. Wanli Kuaijilu (Wanli Accounting Record), which was finished in sixteenth century, is the earliest, and the only existing national financial accounting books in Ancient China till now. On the basis of exploring primary treatment of numeric materials in that book, this paper which it is the first time to introduce Hierarchical Clustering analysis into history field classifies all provinces by considering the level of land tax for them. Then, it uses weighted average of price of these provinces in which is known as the price of others in which is unknown. The entire price is converted into silver. Following this way, this paper establishes the standard of land tax's price for every province. As the precondition, all prices are converted into silver. Using silver as unified measurement unit, we convert all land taxes into silver, and finally get the distributing situation of land tax for all provinces in the sixteenth century.

Authors: Yu, J; Liu, RS; Cao, Y
Author Full Names: Yu Jie; Liu Runsheng; Cao Yan
Article Title: Quantitative Analysis on China's Total Factor Productivity: 1979-2004-Based on DEA-Malmquist Approach
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Total Factor Productivity; Contribution of TFP Growth to Economic Growth; DEA; Malmquist Index
Abstract: This paper presents a quantitative analysis on China's Total Factor Productivity (TFP) based on the non-parametric DEA-Malmquist index approach, which avoids the various problems in parametric method studies, such as the assumption of production function and the need to test the validity and rationality of the parameter estimation. From 1979 to 2004, the average TFP growth rate of China was 1.8%. At the initial stage of reform and opening up, the average TFP growth rate of China was 1%, and its contribution to economic growth was about 7%; in the period of deepening reform, the two above-mentioned numbers were 2.7% and 25% respectively; and at the further deepening new stage, they were 2.1% and 24% respectively. The tendency of the TFP change shows that before 1980s, the TFP growth rate kept rising, and then there were ups and downs until the mid-90s. The TFP growth peaked in 1992 and then began to decline before it became stable after 1995.

Abstract: This paper applies the DEA to evaluate the data on the input and output of S&T resources of large and medium-sized industrial enterprises involved in 26 trades in Tianjin, China. Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Sci-tech Human Resource Competitiveness; the Principal Component Analysis; the Optimization Strategy
Abstract: Sci-tech human resource competitiveness is an important part of the regional economic competitiveness, rational evaluation is the premise and foundation for optimizing the sci-tech human resource competitiveness. Armed with Scientific Outlook of Development, this paper will clearly define the concept of sci-tech human resource competitiveness based on the Theory of the Talent Competitiveness, then the continuous data about six years(2001-2006)of Handan city are collected to build the corresponding model by the Principal Component Analysis. SPSS is applied to analyze it in order to evaluate the sci-tech human resource competitiveness in Handan city. Finally, the optimization strategy of enhancing the sci-tech human resource competitiveness is offered correspondingly.

Abstract: As China's aging society exacerbating, the problem of the social old-age insurance becomes a focus of concern for social old-age insurance. So it is great significant to study on the development level of social old-age insurance in China. In this paper, a new kind of comprehensive evaluation model on the social old-age insurance is built by kernel principal component analysis (KPCA). On this basis, we carry out a comprehensive evaluation by using this method to the development level of the social old-age insurance in China's 17 provinces and cities. The results show that, this comprehensive evaluation method, kernel principal component analysis, has practical application value.

Article Title: Construction of Assessment Index System for Energy Efficiency in Shandong Province
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Energy Efficiency; Comprehensive Assessment; Index System
Abstract: The construction of assessment index system for energy efficiency in Shandong province is with the target to support the energy conservation of Eleventh Five-Year Plan,which also aims to serve the construction of economical society. Based on the connotation of energy efficiency and some principles that should be followed to build the energy efficiency assessment index system,this paper analyses the ingredients and contents of the index system in Shandong. Finally the procedure for constructing index system and specific evaluation method are put forward.

Article Title: Statistical Measurement and Evaluation of the Performances of Listed Companies Based on Samples from SME Board
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Listed Companies; Factor Analysis; Cluster Analysis; Comprehensive Evaluation
Abstract: Indicators such as profitability, solvency, operating capacity, survivability and so on are commonly used to evaluate the operating achievements of listed companies. However, each of these indicators is difficult to represent listed companies' overall performances, and thus can not be used respectively and directly to compare their achievements. Therefore, based on factor analysis of multivariate statistical analysis method, this paper calculates the factor scores so as to make a comprehensive evaluation of each company, and meanwhile by principal factors, it makes a cluster analysis of various companies. Finally, discriminant analysis method is applied to verify the clustering results, and further more it provides a basis for judging the companies' achievements for the future, helping operators and investors to make proper decisions.

Authors: You, SB; Wu, B; Jiang, Z
Author Full Names: You Shibing; Wu Bi; Jiang Zhan
Article Title: A Quantitative Study on the Governmental Service Value
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: GM (1,N) Model; Governmental Function; Governmental Service Value
Abstract: The function and role of government in economic development always attract our attentions. This paper mainly tries to establish GM(1, N) model with the insufficient index system for economic development to define the service value of government, which gets ready for the next stage of measuring it. We find that the government scale of China is proportionate under the assumption targeting on economic development, and it improve the economic development in China. However there is a problem on the governmental consumption and it retards the economic development in China. Eventually we propose Chinese government should first dig out the Service Value from itself and see government as a node while the market functions.

Abstract: This paper is meant to explore the model of public satisfaction evaluation concerning the performance of county governments by analysis indicators and weights. Those to be surveyed include representatives of the general public, business representatives, and People's Congress and CPPCC members.

Article Title: Research on Optimizing Water Resources Usage in Shijiazhuang Area
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Water Resource; Input-output; Linear Programming Method
Abstract: Water resource is basic natural and strategic economic resource. The core of water resource optimization is to raise the efficiency of using water which ensures the sustainable development of economic society by sustainable use of water. This thesis settles Shijiazhuang city as research target establishes water resource input-output chart of Shijiazhuang, analyzes water consuming structure and features of three strata of industry in Shijiazhuang. The thesis also establishes a comprehensive model by combining input-output method and linear programming method. They come to the project of water resource optimization in Shijiazhuang.

Article Title: Statistical Methods to Assess the Level of Urbanization in Yangtze River Delta
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Yangtze River Delta Region; Urbanization; Cluster Analysis; Factor Analysis
Abstract: Taking 16 cities in the Yangtze River Delta region as the research objects, by using statistical data of these 16 cities in the year 2007, this paper selects ten indices to establish a evaluation system on the level of urbanization not only in quantity but also in quality, then resurs to SPSS software, and makes use of cluster analysis and factor analysis to measure the level of urbanization of 16 cities in the Yangtze River Delta region, in order to classify them and find out their differences in the level of urbanization. The results show that Shanghai is the leading city in Yangtze River Delta region. And the levels of urbanization in Suzhou, Wuxi, Ningbo, Nanjing, Hangzhou are higher than the other cities.

Article Title: Fuzzy Comprehensive Assessment of the Readers' Satisfaction Degree to Library
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Readers' Satisfaction Degree; Fuzzy; Comprehensive Assessment; Analytic Hierarchy Process
Abstract: On the basis of designing readers' satisfaction degree indicator system, the paper evaluates readers' satisfaction degree towards library with the method of adopting fuzzy comprehensive assessment and analytic hierarchy process (AHP). This method, a qualitative analysis combined with quantitative means, can reflect library service quality comprehensively. By practically experimenting the assessment, the author authenticates the feasibility of the method.

Article Title: Research on Hangzhou Culture Creativity Index
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Creativity Index; Creative Economy; Evaluation of Competitiveness; Hangzhou
Abstract: The emerging creative economy has become a leading component of economic growth, employment, trade and innovation, and social cohesion in most advanced economies. As a brand new economic form, it requires the scientific assessment system to examine its energy, competitiveness and contribution to the economy development. This paper summarizes global competitiveness index system of creative economy and combines the characteristics of Hangzhou, in order to construct the basic framework of Hangzhou Culture Creativity Index from human resource capital, culture capital, social capital and institutional capital and creativity outputs those five first grade indices.

Article Title: The Models of Insurance Contracts under Symmetric and Asymmetric Information and Their Premium Characteristics
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Optimal Policy; Premium; Symmetric Information; Asymmetric Information
Abstract: In this paper, the models of optimal insurance contracts are constructed on symmetric and asymmetric information by the fundamental pricing principles in actuarial theory Some properties and premium characteristics of the optimal insurance contracts are researched. One model illustrates that the optimal policies can produce Pareto optimal risk sharing between the insurer and the insured under symmetric information, and some forms of the policies are given. Under asymmetric information, the another model shows that the optimal policies are partial insurance coverage due to the existence of moral hazard, and have the defensive function against the moral hazard form the insured. At the last of the paper, a sufficient condition of the monotone increasing about claim size is yielded.

Article Title: The Study of the Impact Evaluation of China's Bio-energy Construction Project on Environment
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Bio-energy; Construction project; Environment; Impact evaluation
Abstract: The rapid economic development in China relies on the increasingly strong demand for energy. But the shortage of coal, oil and other conventional energy and the tremendous damage of resources and environment which are caused in the process of development have slowed down the developing pace of China's economy. Bio-energy as an alternative to conventional energy is an important thing, which related to China's economic development and ecological sustainable development. The implementations of lots of bio-energy construction projects ease the contradiction of supplying shortage of China's energy and reduce the damage which ecology and environment work on using of energy. Now China pay too much attention to the economic feasibility evaluation, but neglect the environmental impact evaluation of project, which restrict the development of China's bio-energy projects undoubtedly and have a negative impact on the development of China's energy strategy. Against above issues, this article will studies environment impact evaluation of bio-energy construction projects, and brings forward evaluation methods and evaluation indicators to evaluate impact degree of China's bio-energy construction projects on environment and to achieve the sustainability objectives of environmental protection. In the end, the related results will be as the reference for the relevant departments and research units.

Article Title: Performance Evaluation of Hedging in ETF Index Fund with Index Future
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Hedging; Index Fund; Index Future; MV-GARCH; Minimum-VaR
Abstract: This paper studies the performances of hedging in 5 Exchange Traded Funds with simulation of HS300 index future. Under the framework of minimum-variance and minimum-VaR (Value at Risk), we compute the hedge ratios using various multivariate GARCH models, and then compare the performances of various models. Under the framework of minimum-variance, in-sample result suggests that, generalized MV-GARCH(VECH) model performs the best, however, the out-of-sample result shows that constant conditional correlation(CCC) model gets the best performance. The paper also shows: in-sample, minimum-VaR is superior to minimum-variance in achieving a high return of unit risk; however, out-of-sample, minimum-variance performs better, either in the return of unit risk or the variance reduction.

Article Title: Empirical Analysis of Development Tendency of Pig Industry in Heilongjiang Province Base on Factor Analysis
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: the Pig Industry; Industry Development; Factor Analysis
Abstract: The research makes a comprehensive analysis on the developing situation of pig industry in Heilongjiang province, with the method of factor analysis of multivariate statistical and the help of SPSS, according to the linear relationship chose 10 representative factors from aquaculture, processing industry, food safety and so on with the competition power of pig industry, to make a analysis and evaluation on the development tendency of pig industry in Heilongjiang province in recent years, by the factor score method, come to the conclusion of the year rankings of pig industry development in Heilongjiang province, combination of features of pig industry development, summed up the problem of the pig industry development in Heilongjiang province, then put forward some suggestions to help the pig industry development. All of this will provide scientific advice for Heilongjiang province to building up the pig production base to support the national market.

Article Title: Synthetic Evaluation on Regional Finance Environment Based on Principle Component Analysis-An Example of WeiHai City
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Finance Environment; Principle Component Analysis; Index System; Synthetic Evaluation
Abstract: Financial environment is the fund support system of regional economic and social development, which plays a very important role in regional economic development. On the basis of designing the index system of regional finance environment evaluation, the principle component analysis is used to evaluate finance environment of Weihai city. Through comparing with other city, like Qingdao, Suzhou, Dalian, Ningbo, Wuxi, Hangzhou and Taian, we can find the shortage of Weihai's finance environment, which provides support for future development and betterment.

Article Title: Comprehensive Evaluation of Economic Benefits of Tourism
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Tourism Economic Benefit; Time Dynamic Evaluation; Correlation Analysis
Abstract: For nearly three decades, China's tourism industry has developed rapidly, and gradually become the pillar industry of national economy, meanwhile, provincial and municipal tourism development imbalance is also becoming increasingly prominent. In order to better understand the current status of tourism in each province and to better assess the development prospects, Time Dynamic Evaluation is used to evaluate the economic benefits of tourism of that 31 regions from 2004 to 2006, which, then will be treated as a measurement of economic benefits of tourism for each region. After that, order-difference will be used to illustrate the development of regional tourism in the three years. Taking into account the differences in the level of provinces and cities affected by a number of economic factors, we analyze the correlation between economic benefits and tourists' attitude towards the quality of service and facilities. We show that an economic benefit is influenced little by the assessment of quality of service and facilities given by tourists.

Article Title: Comprehensive Evaluation and Empirical Analysis on China's Provincial Economic Opening Degree
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Provincial Economy; Economic Opening Degree; Economic Growth; Statistical Analysis
Abstract: According to the statistical yearbooks and other economic statistics information in 2001-2007, through empirical comparison, clustering and regression analyses, this paper discusses the differences of economic opening degree of all provincial regions in China, excluding Hongkong, Macao and Taiwan. The results suggest that there is a remarkable difference of the provincial economic openness and a significant correlation between the openness and regional economy. This is important to achieve a general understanding to the regional economic opening level and the relationship between the economic openness and the regional economic development.

Authors: Wang, XY; Yao, LL; Ji, PX; Wu, JY; Chen, LM
Author Full Names: Wang Xiaoyan; Yao Lunlun; Ji Pixi; Wu Jingying; Chen Liming
Article Title: An Alternative Assessment Methodology to Exploring Regional Development in Sustain
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Sustainable Development; HDI; Environment; Resources; Assessment
Abstract: The regional sustainable development mainly involves the population, resources, environment, economic and social development, and the assessment metholology to exploring regional development in sustain should cover five basic elements. The Human Development Index (HDI) put forward by the United Nations Development Programme (UNDP) has been widely used to measure and compare relative human development level among different countries or regions, and it is a suitable tool to assessing the level of regional sustainable development. However, the Index can not reflect the quality of the regional resources and ecological environment. Based on the application of HDI by UNDP, this paper analyses and constructs one assessment system of regional sustainable development including the resource and environment indexes. At last, the comprehensive evaluation technique based on entropy weight is applied to assess the sustainable development of six provinces or city in China. The numerical example shows that the assessment methodology is easy to operate, and has a strong practical guidance.

Article Title: The Comparative Analysis about the Higher Education Developmental Level of the Various Provinces and Municipalities in China
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Higher Education; Regional Economic; Grey Situation Decision-making; Information Entropy; Cluster Analysis
Abstract: Based on grey situation decision-making and information entropy theory, the paper implements the evaluation for the development levels of higher education of various provinces and municipalities in China, and then by hierarchical clustering method, our country is divided into four categories of higher education region. The results shows the level of the higher education in a province or municipality has a very important relationship with its economic development, and presents the promotion from eastern, central to western region in geographic distribution.

Article Title: Optimization of Components' Utilizing Duration with Limited Products Life Cycle
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Utilizing Duration; Recovery; Optimization
Abstract: The utilizing duration of components and parts within a product is variable generally. How to match them each others to minimize operating cost and surplus value while they are out of use is significant task of designers with review of closed supply chain. For the sake this paper sets out to establish a model to optimize the components' utilizing duration in order to minimize the total cost of products with limited life cycle.

Authors: Fu, XH; Chi, H; Zang, WR
Author Full Names: Fu Xinhong; Chi Hong; Zang Wenru
Article Title: The Evaluation and Comparison of the Capacity for Independent Innovation of Different Types of Rice Research Institutes
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Rice Research Institutes; Capability for Independent Innovation; Evaluation and Comparison; DEA
Abstract: This paper evaluates and compares the capability for independent innovation of different types of rice research institutes by means of the data envelopment analysis-DEA, taking the situation of Sichuan province during 2001 to 2007 as an example. The results show that the efficiency of the independent innovation capacity is the highest in IRRI Academy of Agricultural Sciences. Most activities of the independent innovation is relatively effective in IRRI Subsidiary Institutes of Higher Learning, and the capacity is basically inefficient in the institutes set up by Rice Seed Companies, whereas it has improved a little after 2006. Finally, it puts forward some corresponding countermeasures and suggestions in the paper.

Article Title: Construction Shandong Province towards Two-Oriented Society and Related Monitoring/Evaluation System
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Two Two-oriented Society; Statistical Monitoring; Evaluation System
Abstract: This paper refers to current research experience, points out the how import of understanding the scientific connotation of the two-oriented society, this paper also attempts to establish the two-oriented society statistical monitoring evaluation system including five level indicators and 30 specific targets from five aspects: the development of economic, the friendly people and the natural environment, social environment-friendly, conservation of natural resources, recycling of resources. This paper puts forward four rational proposals for two-oriented society in Shandong Province through the monitoring and evaluation system.

Article Title: The Estimation of the Dominant Capability of Successive Innovation System on Small and Middle Business
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Small and Middle Business; Successive Innovation System; Dominant Capability; Grey Hierarchy Analytic Process
Abstract: Small and middle businesses are subject of innovation. Successive innovation is the basis for small and middle business to survive and develop. To, cultivate and enhance the dominant capability of successive innovation system in an enterprise, the effective approach is to estimate the dominant capability of the system scientifically and reasonably. This study uses grey hierarchy method to estimate the dominant capability of successive innovation system. The purpose of the estimation is to probe into the characteristics and existence of the successive innovation system, unveil the rule of the system and provide the theoretical basis for cultivating the dominant capability of enterprise innovation.

Article Title: Fuzzy Evaluating Financial Efficiency in State-owned Enterprises-Case Study from China Major Industry Base, Heilongjiang Province
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: State-owned Enterprise; Financing Efficiency; the Fuzzy Evaluation
Abstract: Financing is the process of capital allocation and in essence the process of resource allocation in the form of capital supply and demand. As for different industries, the channel, the way and the scale that enterprises acquire funds reflect the allocation efficiency of social funds. The financing efficiency is the main factor in deciding capital allocation efficiency Therefore, the effective way to enhance capital allocation efficiency is to analyze and evaluate enterprises' financing efficiency from vary industries reasonably.

Article Title: Application of Statistic Fuzzy Comprehensive Evaluation Technique in the Evaluation of Teacher's Teaching Quality
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: FCET; Teaching Quality; Evaluation; Model
Abstract: It is one of the important contents in the system of teaching quality evaluation that used to evaluate teachers'. Based on the fuzzy comprehensive evaluation technique(FCET) of statistics, this paper wants to set up a sort of evaluating method and calculate equation, and to get a scientific evaluating conclusion through fixing indexes, weights, and the standard of evaluation of teaching quality. As a result, combining science with practice, this paper had established an evaluation model of teaching quality about the teacher of colleges and universities.

Article Title: An Empirical Study on Evaluation System for Environment-friendly R&D Investment in CHINA
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Multinational Research and Development; Principle Component Analysis; Clustering Analysis
Abstract: Based on the analysis for economy and science of multinational R&D invested region, 13 index indicators are selected in this paper to establish the multinational R&D investment Environment-Friendly Evaluation System of China. And the empirical research is carried out on 31 provinces of China with principle componential analysis and clustering analysis. Firstly, the main component is extracted from the 13 indexes with principle component analysis, and the comprehensive rank is concluded based on principle component function; Secondly, as far as comprehensive rank is concerned, clustering analysis is used to rank the investment environment to four clusters (A, B, C, D). Finally, it can obtain the key factors which affect the R&D investment environment-friendly through the result of empirical research, which play an important role in choosing and improving the R&D investment regions.

Article Title: Research on the Improvement of Technological Capability in Enterprises Based on Knowledge Platform
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Knowledge Platform; Technological Capability; Manufacture Industry; Sample Survey
Abstract: The essence of the technological capability in enterprises is knowledge. The improvement of technological capability of an enterprise must be based on the growth and accumulation of the internal knowledge. Having investigated 128 enterprises of the manufacture industry in China, this article presents that there is significant positive correlation between the construction of a knowledge platform and the improvement of technological capability in enterprises. Therefore, constructing a knowledge platform is one of the effective ways for an enterprise to improve its technological capability.

Article Title: An Index System Introduced to Measuring the Loss Caused by Wildlife
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Wildlife; Loss; Evaluation Index System
Abstract: With the ecological environment gets better, the number of some species of wildlife has grown sharply, which has caused the loss of local peasants. To evaluate the loss caused by wildlife comprehensively, combining characteristics of wildlife, the paper firstly identified the sorts of damage and loss caused by wildlife, in accordance with scientific, systematic and comparable principles. Then the index system of its loss evaluation was set up, up to 47indices, including two first level indices, nine second-level ones, and the connotation of main indices was elaborated for the first time. Based on the indices, the study also established the measuring methods.

Article Title: A Comparative Analysis on China's Urban Employees' Pension Level before and after Reform
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Endowment Insurance System Reform; Retirement Age; the Relative Level of Wage; the Relative Level of Pension
Abstract: Different payment wage and contributing years of urban employees are the main reasons of the difference in pension. Based on the theory of life actuarial, this paper makes actuarial analysis on relative income of urban employees under some assumption and thereby makes comparative research on the difference of pension before and after the reform of China's endowment insurance system. The results show that the reform increased the life stress on the employees in lower level of payment wage, enlarged the gap of pension level of employees in different retirement age and in different gender because the reform reinforced the connection not only between pension and individual payment wage but also between pension and contributing years. Improving the retirement living level of employees in low income and female is an urgent problem to be solved.

Authors: Ji, JH; Qiao, L; Chen, CH
Author Full Names: Ji Jinghua; Qiao Liang; Chen Changhe
Article Title: Measurement and Statistical Analysis of Automobile Industry Development
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Automobile Industry; Industrial Development; Index
Abstract: Since the entrance into the new century, industrial development takes on a new look. Industrial groups with different characteristics rise constantly, industrial economy develops in a circular form and enterprises take various forms to annex and reorganize. In view of the current situation of the automobile industry in our country, the article analyzes traditional indexes of automobile industrial development, its limitations and contemporary automobile industrial development indexes to design a table of the setting of automobile industrial development indexes. It also analyzes and studies theories related to automobile industrial development and makes use of expert evaluation and statistic methods. It puts forward that the development of automobile industry should be measured from industrial foundation, industrial structure, competitive power and dynamic development. Meanwhile, an analysis is made on the growth rate potential of automobile industry in Jilin Province. The article also measures the average growth rate, contribution rate and influence rate of each index to economic growth and establishes a regression model for FAW Group Corporation. On the basis of the analysis, some policies and proposals are put forward which are very feasible and easy to operate to deepening reform, setting up the concept of innovation and increasing independent innovation ability.

Article Title: Double-Deck Urgency Sorting and Analysis of Scientific and Technological SMEs' Cultivating and Supporting Mechanism
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Scientific and Technological SMEs; Cultivating Mechanism; Supporting Mechanism; Double-deck Urgency Sorting Model
Abstract: By the research and empirical analysis of the actively growing cultivating mechanism and environmentally adjusting supporting mechanism, the double-deck urgency sorting model of scientific and technological SMEs' (small and medium-sized enterprises) cultivating and supporting mechanism has been established innovatively. By the operation of the double-deck urgency sorting model, the crucial factors of creating scientific and technological SMEs' core competitiveness were put forward.

Authors: Wang, XM; Yang, JF; Gong, MQ; Zhao, M
Author Full Names: Wang Xuemei; Yang Jianfeng; Gong Minqing; Zhao Ming
Article Title: Reliability Assessment of Gas Supply System Based on Noise Laboratory
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: System Reliability; Unit Reliability; Reliability Assessment
Abstract: This thesis studies the methods of system reliability assessment for the gas supply system in noise laboratories. When the system is used in a noise laboratory, the gas is firstly imported from a gas tank and will sequentially be gone through the process of filtration, compression, purification. After the pressure is increased at a certain level, the gas is finally sent to the gas supplying outlets of each laboratory through pipelines and valves. By using of the method of reliability modeling and assessment, the quantitative reliability assessment of the gas supply system used in noise laboratories has been developed. The result provides a good basis to improve the engineering design and the reliability design, and can be extended to similar fuel supply systems. From an engineering point of view, it is an innovation that the filter in the system is identified, to be a series - parallel mixed structure by considering its physical structure and performance requirement.

Article Title: Studies on Well Allocating Social Insurance Fund and Optimizing Invest Portfolio
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Pension; Diversified Investment; Inflation-proofing and Appreciation
Abstract: How the social insurance fund to keep inflation-proofing and appreciation is one of the hottest issues in theoretical study area and practical work department, which impacts the stability and development of social insurance system and the society. And pension is the most important part in the social insurance system. This essay will focus on the operation pattern of the pension, and put forward that the diversity of the investment composition is the inevitable choice to keep inflation-proofing and appreciation of the pension.

Article Title: Comprehensive Evaluation on Energy Conservation and Emission Reduction in Forestry Sector of China
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Climate Warming; Energy Conservation and Emission Reduction; Comprehensive Evaluation System; Forestry
Abstract: Climate change and energy security have been global problems today. Energy conservation and emission reduction is not only one of the demands to cope with climate warming, but also an urgent and long term task in the process of global economic and social development. Dues to the important role of forest in energy conservation & emission reduction and dealing with global climate change, this paper presents a scientific and complete energy conservation and emission reduction evaluation system of forestry sector based on extensive investigations. This evaluation system comprises four aspects, such as the potential of trees bio-energy in energy structure readjustment, the contribution of china's forest projects to CO2 capture and storage, the effect of science & technology innovation in forestry sector on energy conservation and emission reduction, and the role of forest management on energy conservation and emission reduction, and was established using frequency analysis and expert consultation under the systematic, scientific, pertinence and operability principles. This evaluation system can be utilized to thoroughly analyze and evaluate the energy conservation and emission reduction task of china's forestry sector.

Article Title: An Index System Based Research of Regional Urbanization Level
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Urbanization Level; Index System; Hebei Province
Abstract: After analyzing the defects of traditional measurement of urbanization level, an index system is established which includes 5 first rank indexes (they are economy urbanization level, populace urbanization level, regional landscapes urbanization level, life style urbanization level and environment urbanization), 17 second rank indexes and 29 third rank indexes. An evaluation and analysis of Hebei Province's urbanization level is done as such.

Article Title: Clustering of City's Investment Environment in Anhui Using PCA
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: City Investment Environment; Uneven Development; Set up System; Principal Component Analysis; Clustering
Abstract: Facing the historical opportunity of rising strategy in central region, Anhui should make best of all kinds of condition realizing the connection to Yangtze River delta thus upgrading the economy strength. Pointed to the uneven of Anhui's development, put forward the necessity to appraise city's investment environment. Use principal component analysis (PCA) and clustering to do this study. After setting up index system, use principal component analysis to lower the complexity in analysis and to reduce the relativity between indexes, then do clustering analysis based on the new index system to the cities of Anhui. At last explain the clustering result.

Article Title: Research on Value Measurement of Resources and Environment in Coal Mining Area
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Coal Mining Area; Resource and Environment Value; Measurement
Abstract: The development of coal resources will inevitably disturb resources and the environment in mining area, if it is not compensated reasonably; the further development of socio-economic in mining area will be restricted. However, the impact of coal resources development on the environmental is difficult to measure accurately, which results in the resource and environment compensation lacking of a reliable basis at present. To solve this problem, in this paper we analyzed the impact of coal resources development on resources and environment in mining area comprehensively firstly. Then according to welfare economics and modern econometric theory, resources and environmental value measurement system in mining area is constructed by using opportunity cost, replacement value and contingent valuation method. Using this value measurement system and taking full account of the socio-economic development of the region, the impact of the development of coal resources on the resources and environment in mining area is reflected objectively and comprehensively, which provides a basis for reasonable compensation so that to promote the sustainable development of social economy in mining area. Finally, according to the mine life-cycle theory some proposals about reasonable compensation and sources of funding are put forward.

Article Title: The Evaluation on Logistics Development Level Based on the Principal Component and Cluster Analysis
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Principal Component and Cluster Analysis; Developing Level of Logistics; Regional Logistics Policy
Abstract: This paper comprehensively evaluates the logistics development level of all provinces or cities in China base on the principal component and cluster analysis. It provides an important reference and basis to make regional logistics development policy for government. It takes the indicators calculated by the principal component as the sample matrix of cluster analysis, which reduce the workload of the calculation largely. The new proposed method based on the combination of the principal component and cluster analysis shows a larger improvement than traditional way. And there is a good reference for the regional logistics.

Article Title: Research on the International Competitiveness Recognition of the Textile Industry
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Textile Industry; International Competitiveness; Recognition; Index System; Weight; Fuzzy Evaluation
Abstract: As Chinese traditional industries, the textile industry need enhance the international competitiveness in the process of global competition. In order to speed up the strategies development about the international competitiveness, it's necessary to identify own international competitiveness. Base on the element index system of textile industrial international competitiveness, this paper adopt to fuzzy membership theory, study the theoretical procedures of textile industrial international competitiveness recognition and apply to the competitiveness recognition validity model. Practically analysis the competitiveness recognition, then draw the relevant conclusions.

Article Title: A PIM Method to Measure Economic Contributions from Rural Infrastructure Investment
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Rural Infrastructure; Investment; Perpetual Inventory Method (PIM); Economic Performance
Abstract: Choosing PIM, it estimates capital stock of rural road, water supply and electric power facilities from 1990-2007. It sets up double logarithmic production function C-D model on the basis of hypothesis. Then using Eviews 5.0, it estimates rural infrastructure investment economic performance, ascertains investment contribution level of rural road, water supply and electric power facilities.

Article Title: The Cluster Analysis of Multivariable Panel Data and Its Application
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Multivariable; Panel Data; Cluster Analysis; Productive Efficiency
Abstract: The research on statistical analysis of multivariable panel data is a blank in China. The paper tries to do the basal study on cluster analysis of multivariable panel data. This paper firstly analyses the numeric characteristic and constructs anew the distance function of multivariable panel data and the function of sum of squares. On this base, the paper explains the arithmetic and process of cluster analysis. At last, an experimental analysis is done on productive efficiency of the industrial enterprises in China.

Article Title: A Study of the Optimized and Statistical Model about University Tuition Fees
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: University Tuition Fees; Optimized and Statistical Model; Data Fitting; Multiple Regression
Abstract: In society, the university tuition has been a sharp focus. There are many factors that can influence the university tuition fees, such as financial allocations, the school self-financing, social donations and other funds. In this paper, we find the relationship among those relevant factors that is based on a large amount of data analysis. Then we set the optimized and statistical model about university tuition fees in an area. We solve the model using the method of data fitting and multiple linear regressions and the mathematical software MATLAB 6.5. In this paper, we also set a dynamic economic model to expand that optimized and statistical model. The author gives some proposals about the university charging standards and its pattern.

Authors: Chen, RJ; Chen, FG; Wang, WF; Zhu, MZ
Author Full Names: Chen Rongjiang; Chen Fugui; Wang Wenfeng; Zhu Mingzhe
Article Title: Factor Analysis and Cluster Research on Quantitative Characters of New Cotton Varieties
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: New Cotton Varieties; Yield Characters; Quality Characters; Factor Analysis; Cluster Analysis
Abstract: Factor analysis method was applied to study 15 characteristic indexes of the 13 spring cotton zones in Henan Province in 2004, with cotton yield and fiber quality in all included. The result showed that the cumulative total variance rate of the previous 4 common factors, which reflected most of the characteristic information, to the tested characteristic varieties amounted to 82.75%. Five groups had been clustered of the thirteen tested varieties from the differences in yield and quality according to the scores of the varieties on the common factors respectively. The target to improve every variety had been identified.

Article Title: Evaluation of Enterprise's Sustainable Technological Innovation Motivation Based on Institutional Structure
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Enterprise' Sustainable Technological Innovation; Motivation; Institution Structure
Abstract: Currently the main focus on Enterprise's sustainable technological innovation motivation is to analyze the factors that affect motivation; there are no scholars who study how to evaluate Enterprise's sustainable technological innovation motivation. According to this, the paper design the model of Enterprise's Sustainable Technological Innovation motivation based on institution structure, and take Yunnan Baiyao Group Ltd, Lenovo Group Ltd and Huawei Co, Ltd as cases to analyze, finally arrive at the conclusion that institutional structure factors play an important role in prompting Enterprise's Sustainable technological Innovation motivation.

Article Title: Financial Cost Control to Sewage Treatment Plants of Henan Province Based on Super-efficiency DEA Model
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Super-efficiency DEA; Sewage Treatment Plants; Financial Cost Control
Abstract: Strengthening the cost control by studying the cost-effectiveness is vital to ensure the normal operation of sewage treatment plants. With the application of Super-efficiency DEA model to sort the sewage treatment plants, taken seven sewage treatment plants in Henan Province for example, chosen reasonable cost indicators, this paper constructs a quantitative efficiency evaluation model to solve the low cost efficiency problem by calculating the improvement program. Combined with sensitivity analysis method, the paper shows the variation ranges of the costs and treatment capacity to keep the validity, also to set standard cost as a reference.

Article Title: Performance Evaluation on Thousands of Reservoirs Security Project-Zhejiang Province
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Thousands of Reservoirs Security Projects; Performance Evaluation; Factor Analysis
Abstract: Using factor analysis for performance evaluation can make the meaning of the evaluation factors more specific and better, it reflects the nature of things more clearly. The paper uses factor analysis to implement performance evaluation, extracts three public factors, which is disaster prevention factor, project quality factor and agriculture support factor by building thousands of reservoirs security projects performance evaluation index system, using SPSS13.0 software, come to the conclusion: project performance in Taizhou, Quzhou and Wenzhou are better than the project performance in Zhoushan, Hangzhou, and Jinhua.

Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Colleges and Universities; Customer Satisfaction Index; Quantitative; Appraise
Abstract: In this paper, the characteristic production and customer of colleges and universities are analyzed. a new conception on customer satisfaction Index of colleges and universities is first put forward at home and abroad and a method of quantitative appraise for customer satisfaction Index of colleges and universities is put forward by means of theory and methods of economy and blurrded mathematics.

Article Title: An AHP Method Applied to Selecting Regional Leading Industry
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Leading Industry; Analytic Hierarchy Process; Principal Component Analysis; Entropy Method; Gray Clustering Analysis
Abstract: Regional leading industry is one important aspect that constructs the regional core competition. According to the selection criterion of regional leading industry, the paper first sets up appraisal index system, and then carries on an analysis of leading industry selection of Hebei province by the methods of Analytic Hierarchy Process (AHP), Principal Component Analysis (PCA), Entropy Method and Gray Clustering Analysis, at last gets the conclusion that the results of the four methods are approximately uniform. Statistical methods have their advantages, disadvantages and respective applicability, so in the study, we should consider various factors on the basis of contents and characters of research objects and select the most effective method.

Article Title: The Evaluation Model of the Management Efficiency of Urban Tourism Based on Correction Coefficient and Empirical Research
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Urban Tourism; Management Efficiency; Correction Coefficient; Evaluation Model
Abstract: Urban Tourism is an important field of tourism study, and urban tourism industry is an important part in the development of tourism industry in China. At present, there is a phenomenon of blind expansion in China's urban tourism development in some cities, which want to expand tourism industry input (such as a large number of five-star hotels were constructed) to obtain more tourism output (income). It is a valuable deep discussion that measuring whether the proportion relationship between the urban tourism input and output is reasonable or not. Therefore, this paper use the DEA model to evaluate tourism input-output efficiency of 15 vice-provincial cities in China, in the process, the concept of correction coefficient was introduced to correct the error, which was caused by the different development environment in different regions. Finally, make a comparative analysis on the comprehensive efficiency, technical efficiency and scale efficiency of the 15 vice-provincial cities, at the same time, and put forward the corresponding strategy for the future development.

Article Title: Evaluation Methods for Industrial Competitiveness
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Statistics; Industrial Competitiveness; Evaluation; Application
Abstract: Statistics is the collecting, collating, analyzing and data processing methodology of science. First of all, the evaluation of industrial competitiveness must include all data collection and collation related to the industry, and then it must be based on the industrial competitiveness theory and statistical analysis methods to reach the appropriate conclusions. On the basis of the relevant literatures collection, both at home and abroad, this paper make a systematic analysis and evaluation about the application of statistics in the assessment of industrial competitiveness.

Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Factor Analysis; Financing Performance; Real Estate Listed Company
Abstract: One factor analysis model of financing performance evaluation on real estate listed companies is constructed in this paper by using factor analysis of multiple statistical and analyzing the financial reports. Based on the model, overall scores of the companies are ranked and the financing performances are evaluated scientifically and reasonably.

Article Title: An Evaluation Model for Health Care Systems
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Health Care System; Non-dimensionalization; Evaluation Model
Abstract: To analyze and evaluate the quality of health care system of each country in the metrics, we present model to deeply formulate and analyze the health care system in the whole world. Our model focus on several respects: Level of overall health, Equity in health and Responsiveness. First, we set up a more rational and effective health care system through analyzing and evaluating all the indexes in the healthcare system. Then, we develop the model of the health care evaluation system to evaluate the health care system in the different regions around the world with the statistical data from WHO. Finally, we choose 10 countries in different regions to analyze their national healthcare system. Result of the model shows that Americas, Europe and the region of western Pacific do much better in the view of health care systems in different regions. And the health care systems in Germany, the United States, Japan and the British are the best in the ten chosen countries.

Article Title: An Empirical Study on the Structure of Environmental Concern and the Implications on Green Product Purchasing
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Environmental Concern; Consumer Behavior; Green Marketing
Abstract: Green marketing is driven by green consumerism, which is influenced by Environmental Concern of consumers. This paper selected four main regions (Shanghai, Beijing, Sichuan and Jiangsu) in China for field study with valid samples of 602. On the basis of literature review and surveys of Environmental Concerns (EC) in China, the paper conducts a clustering analysis and Explorative Factor Analysis of EC and discovers four dimensions of China consumers' Environmental Concern, i.e., Balance of Nature, Human Dominance, Scarcity of Resources and Growth Limit, by using Lisrel, The ensuing Confirmatory Factor Analysis of EC shows a four-factor structure and display a perfect fit of the model with ideal model fit indexes(RMSEA=0.060,NFI=0.93, CFI=0.94).This research supports the four-factor structure of the consumer's attitudinal variable in China, rather than the three-factor or five factor construct proposed by other researchers. The research depicts a clearer profile for the environmental concern of Chinese ecologically conscious consumers and lays a foundation for the Ecologically Conscious Consumer Behavior research.

Article Title: Integrated Strength of China's Coastal Ports Study Based on Principal Component Analysis
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Principal Component Analysis; Port Economy
Abstract: China has been a country with many famous ports whose container throughputs are on the top of world ports. Since the beginning of the new century, China has increased investment in large-scale port construction, which produced lots of modern-equipped harbors. However, constructions on a large and spectacular scale have not only enhanced the ports' competitiveness, but also brought some other problem.Based on the principal component analysis, which is one of the factor analyses in statistics, the paper picked 10 factors to describe 18 China's coastal ports, and studied on their integrated strength by using SPSS 15.0. The authors introduced a train of thought to assess ports' general strength and competence, which is quite valuable for making investment decision. They also advised that the throughput of a port is never the only factor to focus on, and some other important factors should be paid a comprehensive attention to avoid over-building and blindly expansion of China's ports construction.

Article Title: On Sino-US Comparative Advantage in Exporting Agriculture Product - Contribution and Competitiveness Analysis with Constant Market Share Model
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: the International Competitiveness of China's Agricultural Products; Model of Constant Market Share; Agricultural Product Trade; Export Structure of Agricultural Products
Abstract: In this article, from the Sino-U.S. comparative perspective, we adopt the model of constant market share to analyze the international competitive factor's contribution to Sino-U.S. agricultural product's export growth from 2002 to 2006, and compare the Sino-U.S. relative variation trend. The result shows: The final competitive effect of China's agricultural export should be positive value, which illuminates the growth of international competitiveness of China's agricultural products has made an active contribution towards agricultural exports; and the final competitive effect of U.S. agricultural export should be negative value, which illuminates the drop of international competitiveness of U.S. agricultural products has brought a negative effect to its agricultural exports.

Article Title: The Unascertained Measure Model of the Coal Mine Cleaner Production Evaluation
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Coal Mine; Cleaner Production; Unascertained Measure Model; Entropy
Abstract: That establishes evaluation index system of coal mine cleaner production, and carries out quantitative assessment to coal mine cleaner production are of great significance for the realization of economic development and environmental protection. At present, the research is not deep enough, as the index system and evaluation method are short of scientific and systematic. In this paper, the evaluation index system of coal mine cleaner production is given, and the unascertained measure model is established to evaluate the level of coal mine cleaner production. Case shows that the evaluation method is feasible and reliable.

Article Title: Research on the Relationship between Customer Satisfaction and Price Overall Evaluation
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Price Cheapness; Price Fairness; Price Variety; Customer Satisfaction
Abstract: Customer satisfaction is an impression derived from good products and low prices offered by the manufacturers. Consumer price overall perception can be jointly expressed by price cheapness, price fairness and price variety. This paper investigates the relationship between customer satisfaction and consumer price overall evaluation. Although empirical study shows that satisfaction degree cannot strongly impacts price overall evaluation, customer satisfaction is a significant component of company performance.

Article Title: Fuzzy Comprehensive Evaluation of Economic Losses of Regional Natural Disasters
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Natural Disasters; Economic Losses; Fuzzy Comprehensive Evaluation
Abstract: This paper presents a comprehensive evaluation system for economic losses of regional natural disasters from direct economic losses, indirect economic losses and derive economic losses. Then we use AHP method and fuzzy math sets to establish a multi-factor fuzzy comprehensive evaluation model for appraising economic losses. The model proves to be feasible and practical by living examples.

Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Financial Ecological Environment; the Principal Component Analysis; Evaluation
Abstract: Good financial ecological environment can promote the healthy development of industry and promote economic and social development. This paper use the principal component analysis method to propose the evaluation model of financial ecological environment of Henan province, and conduct an assessment of financial ecological of the cities in Henan province and rank the cities. The condition of financial ecological environment in Henan province is analyzed from a quantitative point of view, which provides the theory basis effectively to improve the financial ecological environment of Henan province.

Article Title: Optimal Estimators in the Multivariate Linear Model under Balanced Loss
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Balanced Loss; Regression Coefficient Matrix; Best Linear Unbiased Estimator
Abstract: In this paper, optimal estimators of regression coefficient matrix in the multivariate linear model are investigated. Under balanced loss function, the smallest risk properties of linear estimators of regression coefficient matrix in the class of linear estimations are considered. The best linear unbiased estimators of regression coefficient matrix, which are unique with probability one, are obtained.

Article Title: The HRST in High Technology, Which one is Better, PSTA or Scientist and Engineer?
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: High Technology; HRST; PSTA; Scientist and Engineer (SE)
Abstract: Human Resource In Science and Technology (HRST) is new concept in China. Up to now, there has not been a identical counterpart to this term in china statistics yearbook. There are two counterparts to this concept in China Statistics Year Book, one is PAST, and the other is Scientist and Engineer (SE) which one could be better to substitute this term is not to confirm. This paper use data in high technology to test their validity. After canonical correlation and regression analysis, authors found that the Scientists and Engineer made more contribution than PAST to explain the HRST in high technology. And the PSTA in China year book didn't wholly reflect HRST's contribution. Although there are some flaws, Scientist and Engineer is better to the mean of HRST.

Article Title: The Advantageous Industry Location to Develop Service Outsourcing in Qiqihar Based on Factor Analysis
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Service Outsourcing; Advantageous Industry; Qiqihar; Factor Analysis
Abstract: According to the research and the present situation of international service outsourcing industry, this paper studies the influential factors of locating service outsourcing industry from its regional development environment in Qiqihar city. With constructed the influential factors evaluation system of service outsourcing, Factor Analysis method is used to analyze the 15 industries of Qiqihar. Based on the score of the comprehensive advantages, it should be located in the special equipment manufacturing industry and the general equipment manufacturing industry to develop the services outsourcing industry in Qiqihar, and then the countermeasures and recommendations are put forward.
