Article Title: Analysis of Regional Innovation Efficiency and Spatial Discrepancy in China Based on DEA
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Regional Innovation; Efficiency; Spatial Discrepancy; Data Envelop Analysis
Abstract: In this paper, author calculates the regional innovation efficiency in China and analyzes its spatial discrepancy with Data Envelop Analysis (DEA). The analysis result is that regional innovation efficiency general level is low in China and spatial discrepancy is evident, and the regional innovation efficiency in East area in China is higher than that of in West area and Middle area, and in East area the provinces' innovation efficiencies are different, and it is same to West area and middle area. The result also states that the capital input of innovation increases the efficiency stronger than labor input.

Article Title: Statistical Analysis and Tracing Back on the Regional Environmental Quality in the Western and Eastern Regions
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Eastern Area; Western Region; Environmental Quality; Principal Component Analysis
Abstract: To improve the environmental quality is a necessary condition for sustainable development of modern city. This paper chooses the environmental evaluation index of urban area in terms of environmental pollution and ecological environment gathers the initial data released by State Statistics Bureau and uses Principal Component Analysis to analyze the change trends of environmental quality in the eastern and western regions. Then it traces the statistics back to the causality in order to obtain the suggestion of improving the quality of environmental improvement after calculating the comprehensive environmental quality.

Article Title: Analyzing Regional Economic Disparities Based on ESDA in Poyang Lake Area
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Spatial Statistics; Regional Economic Disparities; ESDA; Local Spatial Autocorrelation; Poyang Lake Area
Abstract: The economic growth in each region not only depends on it s own characteristics, but also on those of the regions that form the neighborhood to which it belongs. Growth poles theory or core periphery pattern suggests that different spatial interactions between a region and it s neighbors can enlarge or lessen regional disparities. Unfortunately, the traditional approaches to regional disparities suppose that each region is independent from others, so they just evaluate the regional disparity variations of isolated regions and cannot tell the dynamics of interrelated regions. This paper firstly explores the feasibility of exploratory spatial data analysis (ESDA) in analyzing regional economic disparities. Unlike traditional statistical methods, such as coefficient s of variation, ESDA can incorporate spatial effects into the analysis of regional disparities, identifying global and local disparities at the regional scale and visualizing the spatial distribution and patterns through Moran scatter plots or maps. By means of global and local spatial autocorrelation analyses, this paper then investigates the spatial dynamics of regional disparities at the county level in Poyang Lake Area by analyzing increasing value of primary industry data, 2001-2007. Empirical results show that after more than seven years of reforms and opening up, the overall county level spatial disparities of regional economy in Poyang Lake Area have been greatly decreased over time.

Article Title: The Study on the Optimal Portfolio of China's Social Security Funds Based on VaR
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: VaR; Social Security Funds (SSF); Portfolio
Abstract: This paper, in use of method of VaR, examines the current situation of China's social security funds (SSF). The results show that if the value of risk tolerance is constant, the degree of risk aversion will increase as the creditworthiness becomes larger, in the meantime, the scope of the SSF's portfolio will shrink correspondingly; if the creditworthiness holds, the SSF's risk aversion will increase with the decrease in the value of risk tolerance, the annual yield and value at risk of the portfolio will grow at the same time; With the increase of creditworthiness and value of risk tolerance, the corresponding annual yield, standard deviation, as well as value at risk of the optimal portfolio will decrease.

Authors: Zhang, LY; Yang, YS; Li, SL
Author Full Names: Zhang Liying; Yang Yinsheng; Li Shenglian
Article Title: The Internal Performance Evaluation of Agricultural Enterprises Based on Interval DEA
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Interval DEA; Performance Evaluation; Internal Sub-systems; Agricultural Enterprises
Abstract: Taking 10 agricultural enterprises in Jilin Province as the research object, the author adopted Data Envelopment Analysis to evaluate the relative efficiency of correlative internal sub-systems in the agricultural enterprises. Because of existing error and incomplete information, the data owned by investigation are interval data, and interval DEA was introduced in the paper. First, the author designed the index system which is used to evaluate performance of internal stocking, producing and marketing system in agricultural enterprises according to working-flow. Then the interval data of input and output in the sub-systems were processed by DEA model, consequently, the interval efficiency of sub-systems were calculated. Finally, we realized the internal and overall performance level of 10 agricultural enterprises, and ranked 10 agricultural enterprises with MRA (Minimax Regret-based Approach).

Article Title: Comprehensive Evaluation of Economic and Social Development of Western 12 Provinces based on Gray Correlation Analysis
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Western Economy; Gray Correlation Analysis; Comprehensive Evaluation
Abstract: With the implementation of the strategy for the development of the western regions, the western region economy has been relatively rapid developed. But, the western 12 provinces economic development is extremely unbalanced. This paper selects 28 key indicators to reflect the western economic development situation, takes the Gray Correlation Analysis method, uses the MATLAB software to carry on the data processing, and then makes a synthetic evaluation sorting through the computation of Gray relation grade to the western 12 provinces economic development condition. Empirical results: first Sichuan, Chongqing second, third Shanxi, Guangxi Fourth, Fifth Inner Mongolia, Yunnan sixth, seventh Gansu, Xinjiang eighth, ninth Guizhou, Qinghai tenth, eleven Ningxia, Tibet final.

Authors: Liu, L; Yu, SK; Wang, XG
Author Full Names: Liu Lin; Yu Shunkun; Wang Xiaoguang
Article Title: The Study of Data-processing Technology for Job Evaluation
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Job Evaluation; Data Process; Reliability
Abstract: Job evaluation is the basic work of pay system. It's helpful to improve the credibility and satisfaction of job level by processing the job evaluation data rationally and effectively. This paper takes for job evaluation data-processing technology as one of the key factors which will affect the precision of the job evaluation. This article designs an innovative data processing flow, using Shapiro - Wilk test and Cronbach 's alpha coefficient method to build the test model and reliability model, and verifying the data. It also puts forward an abnormal data-processing method to eliminate its non-randomized impact, so as to make sure the data consistent and reliable. The data processing flow and the methods of dealing with abnormal data described in this paper have been verified in enterprise' evaluation practice, and the effects and feasibility of this data processing technology have been testified.

Article Title: Statistic Analysis and Peer Evaluation on Enterprises' Technology Innovation Performance
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Technology Innovation Performance; Cross-efficiency; Peer Appraisal; Data Envelopment Analysis
Keywords Plus: DATA ENVELOPMENT ANALYSIS; CROSS-EFFICIENCY; TRENDS; CLOSER; DEA
Abstract: Measuring and evaluating the technology innovation performance for enterprises have pivotal function on improving and enhancing the technology innovation capability in enterprise. In the view of multiple inputs and outputs system, the technology innovation can be calculated as the form of relative efficiency based on Data Envelopment Analysis methodology. To overcome the shortcoming on bias weight scheme allocation and difficulty discrimination for efficiency DMUs, a peer evaluation method was applied in this paper. The cross-efficiency can rank all of the DMUs in the view for peer appraisal in technology innovation. An empirical analysis was proposed for measuring the technology innovation performance by statistic and peer appraisal method.

Article Title: A Variables Time Series to Measuring FDI Contributions to Local Macro Economy, Jilin Province
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: FDI; Factor Analysis; Effect
Abstract: We have found the three internal factors (input-output factor, scale factor, efficiency factor) which affect the effect of FDI in Jilin Province by factor analysis, utilizing the 8 variables' time series data, which are relevant to FDI, of 11 year. We have got the comprehensive scores of the FDI's effect in Jilin Province over the past ten years by detailed analysis of the three factors. We have found out since 2005 the effect of FDI in Jilin Province began to be shown, but we should strengthen the guide from such aspects as fixed assets investment, investment in S&T activities, and investment efficiency.

Authors: Nie, QK; Zhao, Q; Dong, W
Author Full Names: Nie Qing Kai; Zhao Qing; Dong Wei
Article Title: A Fuzzy Analytic Hierarchy Framework for Empirical Research of Corporation Cultural Force of Chinese State-owned Enterprises
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Chinese State-owned Enterprises; Corporation Cultural Force; Fuzzy Analytic Hierarchy Framework
Abstract: The paper combines the method of fuzzy synthesis evaluation and character of Chinese central enterprises to set up an evaluation system of enterprise culture force. We actually designed a system of evaluation which including decision-making culture force corporate governance force management force and executive force as a four level evaluation system. We make use of a two-class fuzzy evaluation of enterprise based on fuzzy synthesis method of statistics, in order to equation reference goes here explain some problems exist. We investigate 34 central Chinese enterprises as demonstrative analysis. The result of our calculation based on fuzzy evaluation system mentioned before is that Chinese enterprise culture force is biased-strong wholly, and has some real effects in their development process. In our evaluation, such enterprises also have some competitive advantage, but there really has some space to fill in relating to the subject of Chinese enterprise culture force. The paper has strong applied aspect, and helpful for leaders to know the status of enterprise culture force.

Article Title: Analysis on Circular Economy Development in Yancheng of Jiangsu Province
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Circular Economy; Level Analysis; Synthesis Appraisal
Abstract: To achieve economic, social and ecological sustainable development, the development of circular economy is an inevitable choice for every country. This paper proposes city cycle economy system evaluation model, uses vague and synthesized evaluation method to evaluate the development of circular economy in Yancheng. On this basis some recommendations have been put forward.

Article Title: The Researches of Consumer Price Index on Principal Component Analysis
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Consumer Price Index; Principal Component; Economic Crisis
Abstract: Under the current economic crisis, it is important to analyze the change of consumer price index (CPI). This paper uses Principal Component Analysis as a way to extract and simplify the original variables. The new variables do not only retain the essence reflected by the original variables, but also make the study better focus on the characteristics of the variables. We used three principal components extracted from the eight CPI indicators, and the result of analysis shows that different living supplies have different impacts on CPI and CPI's general scores and ranks of eight provinces at January 2009. The analysis on the CPI plays an active role in formulating government economic policy and fiscal policy.

Authors: Wang, ZL; Fu, Q; Jiang, QX
Author Full Names: Wang Zilong; Fu Qiang; Jiang Qiuxiang
Article Title: Projection Pursuit Model Based on Particle Swarm Optimization Algorithm and Its Application on Water Quality Evaluation
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Projection Pursuit Model; High-dimensional Data; Particle Swarm Optimization Algorithm; Water Quality Evaluation
Abstract: Projection pursuit propounded by Kruskal an American scientist is an emerging statistical method applied on analyzing and processing high-dimensional data, especially nonlinear and non-normal high-dimensional data. The theory of projection pursuit is the interdisciplinary of statistics, applied mathematics and computer technology and is the front research field. Projection pursuit technique studies and analyzes high-dimensional data by projecting the high-dimensional data into a low-dimensional subspace and pursuing the projections which can reflect the structure and characteristic of the original high-dimensional data. The basic theory of projection pursuit model was introduced and particle swarm optimization algorithm was used to optimize its projection direction. Then an application example about water quality evaluation was performed based on the model. The results indicated that projection pursuit model had high capability of processing high-dimensional data; particle swarm optimization algorithm was simple and steady; evaluation results were credible and precise.

Article Title: Discussion and Application of Brand Appraisal Index System of Industrial Cluster
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Industrial Cluster Brand; Cluster Enterprise Personal Brand; Cluster Collective Brand
Abstract: Cluster collective brand named after region and industry/the usual name of product is an inevitable product of industrial cluster developing to a certain stage, which refers to popularity and reputation accumulated from development of industrial cluster in a certain area. It's the concentration and extraction of the marrow of mounts of enterprises' brands, the overall reflection of industrial cluster development level. Following the principle of authority, science, convenient operation, brand appraisal index system should include appraisal of enterprise personal brand and cluster collective brand, the former is composed of Provincial Well-known Trademark, Provincial Famous Brand,Chinese Well-known Trademark and China Famous Brand approved by authority, while the latter is mainly composed of national collective honor/regional honor of industrial peculiarity approved by state-level profession association, collective trademark and certification trademark approved by concerned department of the State Administration for Industry and Commerce, Geographical Signs Products approved by administrative authority of the State Bureau of Quality Supervision.

Authors: Xiao, JX; Mi, CL; Xu, ZY
Author Full Names: Xiao Jixian; Mi Cuilan; Xu Zhiyuan
Article Title: Optimization and Sensitivity Analysis of Least Absolute Estimator
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Least Absolute Deviation Estimator (LAD); Linear Programming; Sensitivity Analysis
Abstract: Least absolute estimator is one of the most commonly used regression method, people concerns it because that its regression result is slightly impacted by singular points, but the so-set models are non-smoothly, which increases the difficulty of calculation. In this paper, for various observations and needs, we first transform least estimation model into different linear programming models, and then solve them by using the relevant software. At last, we set sensitivity analysis on different situations to identify the factors affecting the results further.

Article Title: Applying PPC Model Based on Particle Swarm Optimization in the Program Evaluation of Water and Fertilizer Management
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Particle Swarm Optimization; Projection Pursuit; Water-fertilizer Effect; Valuation
Abstract: The paper used irrigation quantity, yield, quantity of nitrogen fertilizer, and water use efficiency of soybean as evaluation index of water and fertilizer management, the multi-dimensional dimension-reduction technology of Projection Pursuit Classification Model (PPC) was utilized, using Particle Swarm Optimization algorithm (PSO) to optimize their projection direction, conversed the high dimension indexes into low dimension, used the projection function value to evaluate program, and obtained better result. PSO-PPC model provided a new method for water and fertilizer management program evaluation and other judgment decision problem.

Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Chinese Yangtze River Delta; County-level Economy; Factor Analysis; Cluster Analysis
Abstract: This paper applies factor and cluster analysis methods of in multivariate statistical analysis in comprehensively appraising the county-level economic development in Chinese Yangtze River Delta area. Then it makes a discussion why different county-level economic characteristics and development levels are different. Finally it puts forwards the corresponding countermeasures in accordance with the clustered four county levels.

Article Title: The Consumption Structure Discriminant Analysis on Rural Residents in Jilin Province
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Consumption Structure; Discriminant Analysis; Discriminate Function
Abstract: The consumption structure is the pivotal factor to reflect the living status of,residents. With the government reforming in agricultural within the past 30 years, the consumption structure of rural residents has changed dramatically. For measuring the changes on rural residents, the discriminant analysis (DA) was applied for identifying the stages of rural residents' consumption structure based on the 1978-2007 history data in China. For identifying the accurate development stage of Jilin Province, we also can test the rural residents' consumption structure in Jilin Province and forecast the developing tendency in Jilin Province.

Article Title: Research on E-procurement Supplier Performance Assessment Model Based on SPSS Principal Component Analysis and Gray Relational Theory
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Principal Component Analysis; Grey Theory; Supplier's Performance Evaluation Model; SPSS
Abstract: The supplier of e-procurement under at the whole supply chain environment are the main operators of the generalized one. Implementation of ongoing supplier performance evaluation is to control the stable operation of the supply chain the key aspect. In this paper, with theoretical analysis and empirical analysis, put forward the gray relational theory and the principal component analysis SPSS combined to build he supplier performance evaluation index system model under e-procurement, and carry out the relevant empirical research. Examples of analysis showed that the evaluation model for supplier performance evaluation under e-procurement provides a new effective way.

Article Title: Enterprises' Financial Performance Evaluation Based on DEA Methodology
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Financial Performance; Data Envelopment Analysis; Performance Evaluation
Abstract: The performance of enterprises can be reflected by financial and account data. Based on the traditional financial report, the indexes for measuring the financial performance in the view of multiple inputs and outputs system were proposed in this paper. Using data envelopment analysis methodology, the relative efficiency for measuring the financial performance can be calculated which can rank the performance level of enterprises. The empirical was proposed for calculating the financial performance for 47 enterprises in Jilin province.

Article Title: The Credibility Analysis of Accounting Information of Listed Companies in Hebei
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Listed Company in Hebei; Financial Statement Fraud; Main Composition Predicts Matrix; Financial Statement Credibility
Abstract: Domestic and international scholars have paid more and more attention to the issue of financial statement fraud in recent years. Through by a lot of mathematic statistic methods, they had built up the variety of identify matrix of financial statement fraud. The accuracy of the main composition predicts matrix created by Mei Guoping and his research team has reached 95%, which is quite a good result in the current domestic studies. So the author decided to use Mei Guoping's predicts matrix in evaluating the credibility of accounting information of listed companies in Hebei. Because of the reformation of the tax law in 2008 and the study result of Mei Guoping in 2006, the author has revised six indexes of 27 in matrix, which are concerned with profit after tax firstly, such as Return of Assets, Net Income/Operation cost, Actual Income Tax Rate, Delta Return of Assets, Delta Net Income/Operation cost and Delta Actual Income Tax Rate. And then the author took 36 listed companies of Hebei as stylebook, collected the amount of their half-year financial statements in 2008 and given the related analysis. At last the author got their credibility ranks. From the analysis result, it can be seen that the credibility of financial statement of listed companies in Heibei is not as good as we thought.

Abstract: This paper presents a basic method of distance measure between functional data depending on basic function fitting and constructs a new clustering method of functional data. The empirical study proves that the method is effective and also provides good results.

Abstract: In this essay, using multivariate statistical analysis methods, the authors studied operational conditions of Beijing's listed companies. Article Title: Study on Selection of Core Industrial Sectors in Xinjiang Production and Construction Group
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: XPCG; Core Industrial Sectors; Selection; Overall Evaluation
Abstract: According to the relevant theory of regional economy and actual economic situation of XPCG, the paper has structured choosing index system of core industrial sectors in XPCG, and studied positively on the selection of core industrial sectors in XPCG by principal component analysis. The result indicates that six industrial sectors are core in Xinjiang Production and Construction Group which are oil processing and coking plant, chemical materials and chemical products manufacturing, ferrous metals smelting and rolling, plastic products manufacturing, electricity and heat production and supply and chemical fiber manufacturing.

Article Title: The Questionnaire of Internal Consistent Reliability and Model Research-Based on Essential Attribute of Information Entropy
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Questionnaire; Internal Consistent; Reliability; Information Entropy
Abstract: Reliability analysis is an effective analytical method measuring if a comprehensive evaluation system owns the consistent reliability or stability. High reliability is a necessary condition for an effective result, whereas low reliability means low validity. Based on the concept of information entropy and its rigorous theory, this paper constructs a new defining approach to the internal consistent reliability of questionnaire and evaluation model, which overcomes the disadvantage of some classical ways, such as the Cronbach's Coefficienta, Average Correlation Coefficient, etc., Whose internal consistency reliability doesn't belong to the interval [0,1] and sometimes loses truth or can not be calculated This model can be applicable to reliability evaluation of a variety of closed and open questions and has great superiority comparing with traditional methods.

Article Title: Evaluation on the Competitiveness of Beef Industry Cluster in Heilongjiang Province Based on GEM Model
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Beef Industry; Industry Cluster; Competitiveness; GEM Model
Abstract: This paper studied the use of quantitative analysis tool-GEM model, which is used to research evaluation of cluster competitiveness, combined with characteristics of beef industry cluster in Heilongjiang province, analyzed the factors which affect the competitiveness: facilities, suppliers and related companies, firms and strategies, local and foreign markets, then used method of AHP to quantify them, constructed scientifically the index system of evaluation on the beef industry cluster competitiveness of Heilongjiang province. Therefore, based on the objective evaluation on the beef industrial cluster competitiveness of Heilongjiang province, this paper found bottleneck factors for further development. Analyzing the insufficiency of the beef industry cluster development, meanwhile, from three aspects, basic, enterprise, markets, provided countermeasures and proposals, which will enhance the competitiveness of beef industry cluster in Heilongjiang province.

Authors: Zhang, S; Chi, GT; Zhang, M
Author Full Names: Zhang Sui; Chi Guotai; Zhang Mei
Article Title: The Science and Technology Evaluation Model and Empirical Study Based on Maximizing Deviation and Fuzzy Comprehensive Evaluation
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Science and Technology; the Evaluation of Science and Technology; Science Development Concept; Maximizing Deviation; Fuzzy Comprehensive Evaluation
Abstract: According to the essence of Scientific Development Concept: insisting on human-oriented, comprehensive, coordinated and sustainable development, this paper constructed the comprehensive evaluation index system through the selection, screening and rational analysis of science and technology index. By using the Maximizing Deviation to give the weight to each index, this paper sets up Comprehensive Evaluation to appraise the development status of the Science and Technology of China. The first characteristic of this paper is that it sets up the science and technology appraising index system based on the principles of international attention, fast and well, sustainable development and human-oriented, which reflect the Scientific Development Concept. Secondly, it uses the Maximizing Deviation to give the weight to ensure the weight subjectively. Thirdly, by analyzing the factors which influence the guide line layers, it helps to find out the problems of Science and Technology development. Fourthly, it analyzes the problems of Science and Technology development in the period of the Tenth Five - Year Plan of China, and gives out the policy advice for the Chinese government.

Article Title: The Construction of the Evaluation Model of the Teaching Quality Based on AHP
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: AHP; Quantitative; Evaluation Model; Consistency Test
Abstract: First we analyzed the ways of evaluating practice teaching quality and the problems existing. Second based on AHP cleared the steps of constructing evaluating model. Then we analyzed the factors of effecting and restricting the quality and efficiency of Information and Computing Science Major practice teaching. Evaluation index were selected abiding by operability, rationality, comprehensive and quantitative. Then according to questionnaire and statistical analysis of the relevant data we obtained the weight values of every factor based on AHP and set up scientific, quantitative evaluation model. Last it passed consistency test and showed that the model was scientific and rational.

Abstract: Basing on some simple portfolio insurance strategies, this paper presents one strategy, Potive Time Invariant Portfolio Protection (T-TIPP)) strategy. The derives from Time-Invariant Portfolio Protection(TIPP)strategy and Constant Protection Portfolio Insurance (CPPI) strategy. Article Title: Study on Optimum Percentages of NSP Enzyme Preparation and Dietary Fiber for the True Metabolizable Energy of Diets for Geese
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Applied Statistics; Uniform Design; Dietary Fiber; NSP Enzyme Preparation; Geese; Energy Equivalent; TME
Abstract: In order to investigate the effect of dietary fiber and NSP (non-starch polysaccharides) enzyme preparation on TME (true metabolizable energy), and study TME equivalent of dietary fiber and NSP enzyme preparation, Eight diet treatments were made up of 4 levels of dietary crude fiber (3.00%, 5.67%, 8.33%, 11.00%) and 4 levels of NSP enzyme preparation (0, 0.133%, 0.267%, 0.400%), according to U-8 (8(2)) of uniform design experiment method. A total of 45 (Langde x Huoyan) crossbred male geese (42 days of age) were randomly allotted to 9 groups of 5 replicates of 1 goose each. One group was used to evaluate endogenous energy, and the others were used for metabolism experiment by TME respectively. The results suggested that TME showed a quadratic curve pattern, in which there was the maximum when dietary fiber levels ranged from 3% to 11%. True metabolizable energy increased the maximum ( 11.79 MJ/kg), when the levels of crude fiber was 5.50%. Addition level of NSP enzyme preparation was in the range from 0% to 0.40%, TME showed a quadratic curve patterning. When dietary crude fiber level was 3.00%, and NSP enzyme preparation level was 0.31%, TME gained the maximum(11.96 MJ/kg). Energy equivalent of dietary crude fiber and NSP enzyme preparation were -17.45MJ/kg similar to 9.09MJ/kg and 152.50MJ/kg similar to 338.46MJ/kg respectively.

Article Title: Evaluating Urban People's Sport Service in Western China
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Sport for Residents; Services; Quality Evaluation
Abstract: Urban people's sport is integral to the whole sports system. The paper proposes an evaluation pattern on the quality of sports service by inquiring professionals. The urban people's sports service in western China is analyzed accordingly through comprehensive analyzing, Topsis as well as The RSR. The result shows that the factors that affect the overall sports service quality in urban areas are as follows: capital input, organization net construction, human quality, and the recovery and birth control implementation, etc.

Article Title: A Measurement of Competition Degree in Chinese Banking Based on PR Method
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Banking Competition Degree; Non-structuralism; PR Method
Abstract: Based on the data from 1985 to 2004, the banking competition degree is measured in our country by PR method. Some conclusions are drawn: The banking industry is in monopoly competition. Although it descended little between 1993 and 1995, the banking competition degree improved evidently after 1996. The influence of labor on the revenue of commercial banks in China is the least, which reflects the low efficiency of main banks in China in some degree.

Authors: Pan, GH; Hu, NL; Li, J; Lu, HJ
Author Full Names: Pan Guihao; Hu Nailian; Li Jian; Lu Hongjian
Article Title: Principal Component Regression Empirical Analysis on Influencing Factors of Gold Price
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Gold Price; Influencing Factors; Co-integration Test; Principal Component Regression Analysis
Abstract: Most previous studies ignored the multi-collinearity between influencing factors of gold price, which causes spurious regression and affects stability of regression model. Several factors that affecting the gold price has been investigated, an econometric model of gold price was presented based on co-integration theory and principal component regression method. The multi-collinearity problem of traditional model was eliminated by this novel model. The influence degree of the factors was analyzed quantitatively. The empirical results indicate that US Dollar index, CRB index, oil price, GDP growth rate, as well as consumer price index (CPI) are dominate factors influencing the gold price. It will be more reasonable for statistical and practical explanation, and helpful to comprehend the evolution of gold price.

Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Competence; Index System; the Analytic Hierarchy Process; Fuzzy Comprehensive Evaluation
Abstract: Competence Evaluation can ascertain the Enterprise's position in the industry and provide important basis for establishing development strategy and tactics of enterprise, which will guarantee existing and developing of the enterprise. This article constructs enterprise's competence Evaluation Index System, and applies the analytic hierarchy process to do fuzzy comprehensive evaluation on it.

Authors: Tao, M; Li, HW; Song, P
Author Full Names: Tao Min; Li Hongwei; Song Ping
Article Title: Study on the Statistical Indicators System of the Process to Building Green University
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Green University; Process Evaluation; Statistical Indicators System; Fuzzy Comprehension Assessment
Abstract: The paper gives the statistical indicators system of the process to build green university. Green university concept has been put forward for more than ten years. Its statistical indicators index system has not been unified though some assessment indexes systems have been built from the different points of view. In this paper, the process of building green university is summarized after several universities in Shandong Province have been investigated. A perfect process statistical indicators system is constructed after the process of building green university is analyzed systematically. The definition, standard and the measuring of each index have been given. It is expected that it can induct university to make the work of building it in statistics in order to assess it.

Authors: Tao, R; Jin, YJ; Wang, J
Author Full Names: Tao Ran; Jin Yongjin; Wang Jun
Article Title: Research on Data Quality Assessment Technology of Economic Census in China
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Economic Census; Data Quality Assessment; Logical Checks; Post-enumeration Survey; Dual-system Estimation
Abstract: Data quality assessment of Economic Census in China mainly includes quality checks in screening the units, logical checks in census registration and post-enumeration survey (PES) of census. Based on the analysis of existing assessment technologies, this paper puts forward three suggestions for improving, which include extending the assessment of census gross statistical data quality, perfecting sampling design in data quality assessment of census, introducing dual-system estimation in census-PES. All these look forward to improving data quality assessment technology of Economic Census in china.

Authors: Wang, AR; Li, CL; Qiao, JJ
Author Full Names: Wang Airu; Li Chunlan; Qiao Junjian
Article Title: The Application of Cluster Analysis and Discriminant Analysis in the Classification of Countries
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Cluster Analysis; Average Linkage; Complete Linkage; Discriminant Analysis
Abstract: According to three human development indicators: life expectancy at birth, adult literacy rate and per capita GDP of 20 countries in 2005, we classified 20 countries by system clustering method. The classification result of average linkage method is same to the complete linkage method. The 20 countries are divided into three categories. The first class contains 8 countries which are developed, the second class contains 8 countries which are developing and the third class contains 4 countries which are backward. On the basis of clustering, another six countries are classified by discriminate analysis.

Article Title: Quality Discrimination of Peanut Oil by Hierarchical Cluster Analysis of Fatty Acid
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Peanut Oil; Primary Composition Analysis; Cluster Analysis
Abstract: Determination of peanut oil authenticity is one of the most crucial issues in peanut oil quality control and safety. The fatty acid composition of peanut oil, colza oil, palm oil and adulterate oil were first analyzed by primary composition analysis (PCA) method and two characteristic compositions were picked. Then peanut oil, colza oil, palm oil and adulterate oil were clustered by hierarchical cluster analysis (HCA) methods. The result shown that the characteristic value of adulterate oil has a significant difference with peanut oil's. It was very efficiency to distinguish the adulterate peanut oil by PAC and HCA method.

Article Title: The Research on Performance Evaluation System of Finance Support the Development of Export-oriented Agriculture in Heilongjiang Province
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Export-oriented Agriculture; Finance Support; Performance Evaluation
Abstract: As a major agriculture province, since joined in the WTO, export-oriented agriculture in Heilongjiang Province has developed rapidly. The feature of agriculture is weak, and the features of export-oriented agriculture is high-quality, green and industrialization, all these features determining that to develop export-oriented agriculture need more financial support. But in recent years, a large number of commercial finance institutions have shrinked the business department in rural areas, supporting functions of policy-oriented finance tend to weak and outflows of capital in rural areas all restricting the development of export-oriented agriculture. In this paper, through designing the performance evaluation indicators of finance support for the development of export-oriented agriculture, using of Analytic Hierarchy Process and Fuzzy Comprehensive Evaluation Method to evaluate the performance of finance support for the development of export-oriented agriculture in Heilongjiang Province.

Article Title: The Air Pollution Study Based on Clustering Analysis in China
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Air Pollution; SAS; Clustering Analysis
Abstract: China's Air environmental problems are becoming more and more prominent in the economic development. Economic development and air pollution of various regions is unbalanced to some extend. In this paper, using the SAS statistical software cluster analysis methods from the air pollution point of view, we comprehensively analyze the air pollution situation in the process of regional development which is of a strong practical significance.

Article Title: Shrunken Principal Component Least Squares Estimator
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Multicollinearity; Shrunken Principal Component Estimator; Admissibility; Mean-squared Error
Abstract: In this paper, we propose a Shrunken Principal Component Least Squares Estimator for the regression coefficient. Using one biased parameter, we can give different shrunken ratio to different eigenvector corresponding to the different eigenvalue. The admissibility of the estimator is discussed. And its mean-squared error is compared analytically with the Principal Component version. Finally, the performance of the new estimator is evaluated for a real data set.

Article Title: Evaluating Governance Efficiency of the Board of Directors Based on Super-efficiency DEA: Evidence from China's Listed Companies
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Board of Directors; Super-efficiency DEA Model; Governance Efficiency
Abstract: Board of Directors (BoD) has played an important role in corporate governance; a perfect BoD can help to improve financial performance of the corporate. On the premise of BoDs' effectiveness, this paper uses super-efficiency DEA model to evaluate BoDs' governance efficiency of China's listed companies, regarding board characteristics as inputs and financial performance indexes as outputs. Our purpose is to find the best board structure, therefore, to improve BoDs' system in China.

Article Title: Application of Fuzzy Cluster in Selection Research on SMEs' International Partners
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: International Cooperation; Multistage Gray Appraisal Model; Fuzzy Cluster Method; Partner Selection
Abstract: The economical globalization provides an advantageous exterior macroscopic environment for SMEs. But as there are intrinsic instability in the coordinating relation during the process of participating international cooperation, Chinese SMEs also face many setbacks and defeats, the most important reason in which is that the selection of the international partners is not successful. Therefore, on the basis of designing an evaluation system for the SMEs' selecting their international partners this essay establishes a multistage gray appraisal model to calculate the quantitative evaluating criteria. At last the fuzzy cluster method is applied to achieve fuzzy evaluation matrix. At last evaluation index grade standard is obtained by compound judgment. The goal of the research is to supply a more efficient method for Chinese SMEs' international partner selection.

Article Title: The Study on Evaluation of Financing Ability of Technological Enterprise
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Technological Enterprise; Financing Ability; Analytic Hierarchy Process
Abstract: The paper utilizes the AHP (analytic hierarchical process) to construct evaluating indicator system of financing ability of Technological Enterprise, carries on the investigation in view of financing situation of Technological Enterprise in Jilin province, and conducts the empirical study to the cruising data through establishing financing ability evaluation model of Technological Enterprise. The findings indicate that the technical level of Technological Enterprise, the financial situation and the economic environment decide its financing ability. These researches have very important significance to make the decision scientifically by the policy maker, the investor and the Technological Enterprise.

Article Title: Coal Mine Safety Evaluation Model Based on Fuzzy and Entropy Weight
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Coal Mine; Security; Fuzzy Comprehensive Evaluation; Entropy Weight
Abstract: Based on entropy and fuzzy comprehensive evaluation theory, we establish the Coal Mine Safety Evaluation Mode of fuzzy and entropy weight. The process of the Evaluation includes ensuring evaluation factor, ensuring evaluation set, single-factor evaluation, calculating weight by using entropy theory and comprehensive evaluation. The example proves that evaluation result of this model is practical.

Article Title: Positive Analysis on Enterprise Performance of Listed Companies in Chinese Pharmaceutical Industry
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: the Pharmaceutical Industry; Listed Companies; Enterprise Performance; Factor Analysis
Abstract: This paper adopts the factor analysis of multivariate statistical analysis to measure the enterprise performance, and then uses the cluster analysis to classify the listed companies in Chinese pharmaceutical industry. Finally it proposes the countermeasures and suggestions for promoting the enterprise performance of the listed companies in Chinese pharmaceutical industry. Article Title: Application of Multi-level Evaluation Model of Grey System for the Undergraduate Comprehensive Quality Evaluation
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Multi-level Evaluation Model of Grey System; Grey Relational Degree; Undergraduate Comprehensive Quality
Abstract: The comprehensive quality of undergraduates is playing an important role in the employment, so its evaluation is of practical significance. Because the indices of evaluation are often short of comparability, some common evaluation methods are not very rational to reflect the comprehensive quality of undergraduates. However, multi-level evaluation method of grey system can convert the complementary indices which are not comparable into comparable ones, especially for the evaluation of multi-index system, which can overcome the disadvantages of common methods. This paper discusses the application of multi-level evaluation model of grey system for the undergraduate comprehensive quality evaluation, and data analysis shows the coincidence between the evaluation results and the actual situation, indicating that this method is feasible and effective.

Article Title: The Evaluation of Animal Welfare Based on Triangular Fuzzy Number Analytic Hierarchy Process
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: AHP; Animal Welfare; Management Evaluation; Triangular Fuzzy Number; Weight
Abstract: This paper, based on the forty-three indicators of animal Physiology welfare, including environmental welfare, health welfare, mental welfare and behavioral welfare, totally five aspects as the subject, established the evaluation model of animal welfare management in zoos, and used Triangular Fuzzy Number Analytic Hierarchy Process to draw the weights of various evaluation factors, the results indicates that physical welfare, environmental welfare, health welfare, mental welfare and behavioral welfare in the respective weights are 0.251,0.222,0.179,0.182,0.166; Through the applied evaluation of the welfare in Heilongjiang Northeast Tiger Animals Garden, it indicates that Heilongjiang Northeast Tiger Garden of animal welfare is in good conditions and is in line with the actual situation, which illustrates this method can be used in evaluation of zoo animal welfare management.

Article Title: The Determination of Weights for Credit Rating Indicators of Hi-tech SMEs
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Hi-tech SMEs; Credit Rating; Indicator System; Weights
Abstract: The weights of existing credit rating indicators of hi-tech SMEs are determined through expert investigation method (EIM) and analytical hierarchy process (AHP). Comparative judgment matrixes are built on the results of questionnaires. Calculations are made with maximal latent roots to eventually obtain the weights of the credit rating indicators of hi-tech SMEs. While reducing reliance on subjective judgment of the weights, the approach provides a theoretical basis for the quantitative analysis, improving the accuracy of the weight vectors, the operability of the indicator system and the reliability of credit rating results. These research results can provide information for society to know and hold the credit rating condition of hi-tech SMEs, provide support and guarantee for relative advantage main body to make decisions for investment, and provide evidences or references.

Abstract: With a nonparametric Malmquist index approach; this paper has analyzed the efficiency of energy-saving & emission reduction with provincial panel data from 2003 to 2007 in China. The results show that the efficiency of China's energy-saving emission reduction was improving, and the vast majority of regions were in the process of efficiency of energy-saving emission reduction.

Abstract: This paper attempts to make use of input-output method to build the basic indicators which show the capacity of absorbing the employment in all sectors of Jiangxi Province, use the production rate to adjust the input-output coefficient, calculate indicators of all sectors, such as comprehensive employment indicators and employment related, study the sectors' total output flexibility, employment effects of each other and the ability to absorb employment, and do a comparative analysis to the employment capacity of industry to absorb, so we can identify the large employment potential sectors in Jiangxi Province.

Article Title: The Factor and Cluster Analysis of the Cross-bred Cotton's Fiber Quality in the Yellow River Zone
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: the Yellow River Zones; Cross-bred Spring Cotton; Fiber Quality; Factor Analysis; Cluster Analysis
Abstract: 19 cross-bred spring cotton varieties had been gathered in 17 test points in the Yellow River Zone in 2005, examining 8 norms such as fiber length, strength, micronaire, elongation, reflecting rate, the yellow degree of fiber, uniformation, spinning consistence index. Frequency, factor and cluster analysis method were applied to study and analyze the district distribution traits of the cotton fiber quality. The general traits of the fiber quality of the cross-bred spring cotton down the Yellow River were medium fiber length, a little bit lower strength, a bit higher medium micronaire value, high-strength cotton of spinning index fit to spin 60 yearn accounts for only 22.6%; 3 common factors, which explained in return 77.85% of the total varieties, could be extracted from 8 fiber quality indexes; 17 different ecological points had been divided into five ecological sub-zones of the similar fiber quality, No. I sub-zone includes Huaibei, Shijiazhuang, Xihua, Xinxiang and Yangling. No. II sub-zone includes Linxi, Anyang and Tianjin. No.III sub-zone includes Cangzhou, Zhengzhou, Changyi, Huimin and Yuncheng. No.IV sub-zone contains Handan and Shangqiu. No. V sub-zone contains Linqing and Ningjin.

Article Title: The Quantitative Analysis of Regional Leading Industry Selection-The Empirical Study Based on Yunnan's Data
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Shift-share Analysis; Leading Industry; Regional Economy
Abstract: Applying a high economic growth rate as the benchmark, this paper uses the method of shift-share to study the issue of regional leading industry selection. All industries are divided into 6 categories according to their growth characteristics, which provide a new idea for a reasonable selection of regional leading industry. The empirical study based on the data of 47 industries in Yunnan shows that the method proposed is effective and operational.

Article Title: Evaluating the Performance of BaoSteel Avoiding Antidumping
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Anti-dumping; Performance Evaluation; Industrial Concentration
Abstract: Based analysis on the developing tendency and characteristics of steel and iron industry, Taking BaoSteel-the biggest one in China as example, mainly analyze its international route and motivations of avoiding antidumping from foreign countries, improving international competitiveness at the background that the antidumping is becoming intensive and the industry is shifting to the developing countries. The focus is laid on the evaluations of performance of avoiding antidumping. The conclusion is that BaoSteel is facing great challenge although it had some achievement.

Article Title: Researching on the Statistical Evaluation Index System of Harmonious Cities
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Harmony; Harmonious Cities; Statistical Evaluation; System
Abstract: In this paper, we would adopt the methods such as a large number of observation and statistics section, in view of the status of the construction of harmonious cities and widespread problem, to proposed the establishment of system of statistical methods on harmonious cities evaluation index, specific statistical evaluation of harmonious cities and the corresponding method of calculation or listed. We believe that is needed to design the scientific and rational statistical evaluation procedures on harmonious cities, to construct population, resources and other support systems and the specific statistical evaluation harmonious cities under the support system. We conclude that the harmonious cities concept should be descript into the evaluation of specific indicators or data, so that all levels of government and related departments are more targeted and examination.

Article Title: Study on Evaluation of Developing Vulnerability in the Coastal Zone of Hebei Province
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Hebei Province; the Coastal Zone; Vulnerability; Current Situation Evaluation; Grey Theory MGM(1, n) Model; Envelopment Rend Evaluation
Abstract: During the region's economy development process with economical developed and densely-populated coastal zone, with a large number of occupied resources, pollute the external environment, economic and social systems show its vulnerability to serious impact on the region sustainable development and even cause the system crashes. Through the analysis of vulnerability index Coastal Zone of Hebei Province, the establishment of the economic vulnerability assessment system in the Coastal Zone of Hebei Province. Fuzzy evaluation method is used for current evaluation and gray prediction model MGM(1, n)is used for trend evaluation in the cities and counties of Coastal Zone in Hebei Province, and then the vulnerability in the process of development of cities and counties are emerged and the optimize adjustment measure are offered in the paper.

Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Factor Analysis; Cluster Analysis; Regional Discrepancy
Abstract: The article proceeds empirically study on regional differences about 17 cities or regions in Shandong Province by Factor Analysis and Cluster Analysis based on the construction of comprehensive evaluation index system. Through the analysis of the result on the empirically study, the article bring up rationalization proposals to reduce the regional differences of Shandong Province based on theory of the coordinated development of regional economic. Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm

Abstract: In order to eliminate the subjective influence on the calculation of environmental influence weigh, we evaluated the ecological environment in Jinan City using grey statistic decision analysis in this article. The result showed the ecological environment is somewhat satisfied by inhabitant. The grey statistic decision analysis eliminated the subjective influence and simplified the calculation steps. The method is reasonable. The result was a new attempt of using the grey statistic decision analysis method in the calculation of weigh of polluted atmosphere factor.

Article Title: On the Comparative Research of Construction Process of Innovational City in China
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Innovational City; Index System; Construction Process
Abstract: The construction of innovational city is the key to urban economic development in knowledge-based economy era. Based on the analysis on the evaluative index system of innovational city, it takes 19 important cities for reference, such as Beijing. The paper analyzes the connotation of innovative city, the principle of innovative design and the construction of evaluative index system. Three indicators in level-1 are respectively innovation environment, innovation ability and innovation performance. There is 13 indicators in level-2, such as infrastructure, investment in innovation, investment in human capital and etc. In addition, there are 44 indicators in level-3. Based on the detailed analysis of the indicators, the paper discusses the construction process of innovational city and gives the improvement scheme.

Article Title: Nonparametric Statistical Method-the Applications of DEA in Factor Analysis of Congestion Phenomenon
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: DEA Model; Congestion; Factor Analysis
Abstract: As one of the most important conceptions of returns to scale (RTS) in sphere of production, congestion describes the economic phenomenon in which the inputs in the process of production decrease, whereas the outputs increase. Data Envelopment Analysis (DEA), as a kind of nonparametric statistical method, has broad applications in all kinds of economic fields. According to requirement of actual production, this paper breaks through traditional analysis mode on RTS analysis, makes factor analysis for congestion phenomenon with the application of DEA models, as well as finds out the real causes that generate congestion, so as to supply effective guide for productive practice.

Abstract: This paper expatiates on the concept of green technological innovation of brand building, stand out the importance of green technology and innovation. Then, by investigating and studying the current situation about green technology innovation in Changzhou, and establishing the evaluation system, it is analyzed the cases for green technology innovation in barriers in the manufacturing industry in Changzhou. According to the analysis above, it is made out countermeasures and suggestion in the internal and external aspects points, including the green business philosophy, management system, the guiding of government and public awareness, and other aspects of the measures and recommendations.

Article Title: Research on Attitudes toward Shanghai's Tourism Image Based on the Factor Analysis
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: World Expo; Tourism Image; Attitude; Factor Analysis; Sustainable Development
Abstract: With the upcoming 2010's World Expo, Shanghai's tourism industry will meet another golden opportunity. The tourism image is one of the most important factors affecting the sustainable development of tourism industry. The research object of this paper is whether the tourists are satisfied with Shanghai's tourism image or not. At first, the paper has selected 16 indexes, which have great influences on their attitude, and designed a questionnaire aimed to do an empirical investigation. Moreover, the factor analysis method has been used in the paper to analyze the statistics collected from the investigation. Finally, the paper has set up the index system for evaluating attitudes and the integrated measurement model of Shanghai's tourism image, which offer some valuable references to the sustainable development of Shanghai's tourism industry.

Article Title: Application of Principal Component Analysis on Comprehensive Evaluation of English-major Graduates' Academic Performances
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Principal Component Analysis; Graduates; Comprehensive Academic Performances
Abstract: With the help of principal component analysis, this paper analyzes specialized course scores of the graduates of 2005 majoring in English in our university. The results reveal different features of their specialized course scores and demonstrate the main factors affecting their comprehensive academic performances. Thus, it provides a valuable guidance for promoting both teaching and learning.

Authors: Wang, LJ; Liu, JT; Wang, WB
Author Full Names: Wang Lijuan; Liu Jiangtao; Wang Wenbin
Article Title: An Integrated AHP/DEA Model for Optimal Selection of Equipment Supplier for Petroleum Industry
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: AHP; DEA; Supply Chain; Supplier; Equipments for Petroleum Industry
Abstract: The selection of equipment suppliers for petroleum industry directly influences the operation of petroleum enterprises. Comparative analysis on single aspect is usually applied for evaluation of the suppliers, while supply chain management is adopted nowadays for modern enterprise management, taking the optimal of the whole supply chain as the ultimate goal. The equipment supplier selected with comparative analysis on single aspect optimization methods could probably not be the most optimized in terms of the whole supply chain. In this paper, we propose an integrated qualitative and quantitative evaluation method featuring AHP and DEA, which is used to perform overall evaluation of suppliers.

Authors: Yin, ZJ; Guo, HJ; Wu, X
Author Full Names: Yin Zhijun; Guo Huijuan; Wu Xia
Article Title: Analysis and Evaluation of Enterprise's Science and Technology Innovation Ability Index Based on Questionnaire
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Enterprise's Scientific and Technological Innovation Ability; Factor Analysis; SPSS; Electronic Enterprise; Questionnaire
Abstract: This paper first proposes nineteen targets which effect enterprise's science and technology innovation ability based on the thought of factor set. It obtains the evaluation information of the influence index about science and technology innovation ability by investigating relevant experts of fifteen electronic enterprises in Tianjin. Then it acquires the basic data by using dimensionless method which is statistically analyzed with SPSS 14.0 software. After getting the factor loading matrix and rotating it, it selects five main public factors by explaining cumulate percent by 85.648% variance and then explains them. At last, combining with variance contribution, the paper establishes comprehensive linear evaluation function of enterprise's science and technology innovation ability evaluation.

Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Rural Residents; Household Income and Expenditure; Sichuan; Factor Analysis
Abstract: This article uses the factor analysis method of the multiple statistical analysis and selects 12 kinds of representative indicators in local resident's family life, which carried on the factor analysis of rural residents' household income and the data of consuming of 31 provinces and cities in the whole country with the aid of SPSS software. The results reveals that Sichuan Province is regarded as large provinces of people and strong province of economy of the western region,but it's revenue and expenditure of rural resident's family have enormous differences comparing with the eastern coastally. The paper has further put forward the tactics which raise revenue and expenditure of rural resident's family.

Abstract: The article analyzes the connotation, system structure, performances, functions, and main features as well of eco-province in theory, builds an evaluation indicator system composed of 25 indices which determines the evaluation standard for eco-province, and defines the related weight for each index. It suggests to process index data in dimensionless way with fuzzy membership function method, based on which an overall evaluation model for eco-province construction process is built. Many financial indexes are made into a few factors which mostly affect enterprise credit, thereby credit rating process is more scientific, standardized and systematic.

Author Full Names: Du Lanying; Li Jianfeng; Hou Jundong
Article Title: The Research on Non-governmental Organization's Social Credit Integrated Evaluation Based on Fuzzy Sets and AHP
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Nonprofit Organization (NPO); Social Credit; Fuzzy Comprehensive Evaluation; Analytical Hierarchy Process (AHP)
Abstract: This paper constructs an evaluation index system for evaluating Chinese Nonprofit Organization (NPO) by a theoretical and empirical method under a series of criteria directions for forming evaluation index system. And according to the problem between requirement of accuracy for comprehensive evaluation and the inaccuracy feature for social credit itself, fuzzy mathematics (FM) and analytical hierarchy process (AHP) are used to set up a fuzzy comprehensive evaluation model for the social credit of NPO in China. And in the end, a NPO is selected to test the detail procedures and validity of this method and model.

Authors: Jin, ZC; Gao, QB; He, J
Author Full Names: Jin Zhichao; Gao Qingbin; He Jia
Article Title: A Comparative Study of Two Multiple Classification Methods Based on Partial Least Squares Using Tumor Microarray Gene Expression Data
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Partial Least Squares Method; Microarray Data; Multi-classification; Cross Validation
Abstract: Gene microarray technology has revolutionized the way that cancer genes are monitored. It can scan thousands of genes at one time. Now it becomes one of the most powerful and versatile tools available in cancer research. How to use expression data to classify the multi-classification cancer samples becomes an urgent problem. Partial least squares (PLS) method has been proved to be a useful tool. Objective: Two multi-classification methods based on PLS were introduced and a comparative study was conducted. Methods: Four different significant gene selection methods were performed on four real tumor microarray gene expression datasets, and then two classification methods were carried out. Incomplete cross validation was used to assess the gene selection methods. The best gene selection method entered the following step. Under the best gene select method, total cross validation was used to evaluate the accuracy and reliability of two classification methods. Result: Two multi-classification methods can reach a good accuracy. Evaluated by incomplete cross validation, variable importance in projection (VIP) value was the best differentially expressed genes selection method. With the top 200 genes collected by VIP value and 4 components level, PLS-LDA and PLS-DA had quite good results. The average error rate and the difference between t-LOOCV and t-2-fold CV showed that PLS-DA outperformed PLS-LDA on accuracy and reliability.

Article Title: An Evaluation on Core Competence of Industrial Clusters
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Industrial Cluster; Core Competence; Evaluation
Abstract: Core competence of industrial clusters consists of five key factors. They are cultural competence of industrial cluster, learning ability, innovation ability, specialization, cooperation and interaction ability, and resources integration ability. Using the ARP method, this thesis establishes an evaluation index system of the core competence of industrial clusters and its evaluation pattern.

Article Title: Effectiveness Analysis for the Allocation of Science and Technology Resources in Jilin Province Based on Circular Economy
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: The Circular Economy; Allocation of Science and Technology Resources; DEA; Effectiveness
Abstract: To develop the circular economy is the inevitable choice and important guarantee for the implementation of the strategy for sustainable development. The circular economy can not develop alone without the support of science and technology. Therefore, regional circular economy puts more emphasis on the optimal allocation of science and technology resources. With the principle of 3R, this paper manages to build a system of evaluation for the allocation of science and technology resources, otherwise, through the means of DEA (Data Envelopment Analysis), the paper evaluates the allocation of science and technology in Jilin Province from the horizontal and the vertical angles, and further points out the direction and focal point of optimal allocation of science and technology resources when Jilin Province develops circular economy.

Article Title: The Construction of AHP-based Evaluation System of Teacher's Ability
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: the Analytic Hierarchy Process; Basic Ability of Teacher; Evaluation of Level; Priority
Abstract: One of the most important things of teaching is how to improving the quality of teacher. Excellent teacher is the core of the college teaching. Standing on the point of the student, this paper abstract a series of basic ability from the skills teacher should predominate. Then we construct an AHP-based evaluation system in order to have a deep analysis on the essentiality of the teacher's ability. Results show that the AHP approach is a versatile tool that can be applied to a wide range of ability evaluation problems.

Article Title: The Empirical Research on Energy Efficiency of Industry Section in China
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Energy Efficiency; Stochastic Frontier Production Function (SFA); Technology Progress
Abstract: Based on analysis on effect factor of energy efficiency of Industry section in China, the paper made an Empirical research on Energy efficiency of Industry section by Stochastic Frontier Production from 1997 to 2006. The result indicates that technology progress, price of energy, environmental regulation and industrial structure are the effect factors of energy efficiency of industry section. A comparison was made between all the industry sections. In the end, the paper measuring the real energy efficiency of industry section and propose suggestions for government and corporation respectively.

Article Title: The Researches on Investment Strategy of Multi-generation Emerging Technologies
Source Title: COMPREHENSIVE EVALUATION OF ECONOMY AND SOCIETY WITH STATISTICAL SCIENCE
Conference Sponsor: Int Inst Appl Stat Studies,Appl Stat Inst Shandong Prov,2009 IIASS Conf Comm
Author Keywords: Investment Strategy; Multi-generation Emerging Technology; Real Options; Technical Transform
Abstract: This paper provides an emerging technology investment model considering the enterprises' synthesis quality, absorbency and the quality of emerging technology. Based on that, suppose emerging technologies development state obeys Poisson process, the investment strategy of multi-generation emerging technologies is analyzed by applying probability, statistics, dynamic programming and real options pricing theory, in the case of many technical transforms implemented by enterprises. The investment value of enterprises invest in emerging technology under special circumstances, the optimal conditions and the optimal threshold for optimal strategy of enterprises to invest in the multi-generation emerging technologies are obtained, which provides a reference for the management of emerging technologies.
